In 2009, the website had a registered base of more than 7 million users.

name: What Makes Us Special
summary: What do you need to start a school newspaper? The team of course! Nobody is perfect. Everyone is different.

name: Whenever You Can Breathe
summary: An autobiographical short RPG about grocery shopping. It's about being stuck. It's a hanging out with your friends sim. It's about weird spatial relationships. It's about grounding.

name: Whac-a-Mole
summary: Whac-a-Mole is coming to your copy of Microsoft Windows! Watch in wonder as your mild-mannered mouse is transformed into the proverbial blunt object. Slam the enormous hammer down with a click of the mouse as you prowl the mole-infested landscape. Grit your teeth, take aim and BOP moles in a split second as they jump and taunt you to take your best shot! Roar as you score a direct hit, triggering a chorus of cartoon sound effects and hilarious animation! Unlike passive screen savers or intellectual adventures, Whac-a-Mole delivers pure entertainment as you absent-mindedly BASH devilish rodents.

name: What Happened in Addison's Grotto
summary:
A young woman from a small fishing village goes missing. Days later agents of an unknown organization find her, take her to a secret location. The young woman saw something she shouldn't have and now something else sees through her.

It needs to be found, isolated, and exorcised.

You're the only one who can do it.

name: Whore Dealer
summary: Whore Dealer is a puzzle game, you only need to swap the bricks to restore the pictures. The game support cheating mode and browsing pictures with one hand so that you can unlock all pictures in just one minute.

name: What Is Love?: Vol. 1
summary: What is Love you may ask... Love is a game. Pretty good one actually, full of pretty girls with dark secrets and everything you ever wanted. Love is in the air and you can breathe deeply. And do other stuff. Deeply. But have in mind that your actions matter so Baby, don't hurt me!

name: What the Bat?
summary: You have baseball bats for hands - now go! In this surprising VR comedy, you play through a series of silly physical mini-games that make you laugh, cry and even pet nice animals.

name: What's Missing?
summary: What's Missing? is a first-person, surreal puzzle game where you spot the differences between repeating identical rooms. Explore the limits of changes as it goes beyond just physical objects. Follow Gregory's journey to escape this magical loop and unveil the mystery of his dark past...

name: What's Your Hidden Power?
summary:
With rumors from your past forcing you into a life of solitude, your lonely days show no signs of changing.

Even the entrance ceremony for your new high school holds no appeal—promising three more years of exactly the same isolation and bullying you were victim to all through middle school… Until someone sees you for who you truly are.

Dragged into a world you never thought you’d see as part of a top secret club, this is your chance to finally find a place where you belong!

name: Where's Oswald?
summary: A short horror experience taking place in a dream or a memory.

name: Whale of Noise
summary: The autobiography of a whale who wants to learn how to sing.

name: Where Is Here: New Home
summary: A sci-fi, survival horror and first-person game. The player will encounter numerous of creatures and characters that involves a mystery to be unraveled on all worlds, finding clues and going through portals. The player progresses through exploration and may die if they fail to avoid the monsters.

name: White Paper
summary: What is your subconscious mind trying to tell you when you are mindlessly drawing on a piece of paper? Maybe someone trapped there, in a dark, damp basement and yes, screaming for help and trying to break out?

name: Where are My Potatoes?
summary: Hero nut character need potatoes. Solve puzzles in different level to reach level end and collect missing potatoes

name: White Heart Baekgu
summary: First in a trilogy of South Korean platformers based on the animated film Hayan Maeum Baekgu, itself based on the 1993 news story surrounding the dog which travelled over 260km in six months to reunite with its previous owner. Received official localisation in the CIS and France.

name: White Heart Baekgu's Second Story
summary: Second in a trilogy of South Korean platformers based on the animated film Hayan Maeum Baekgu, itself based on the 1993 news story surrounding the dog which travelled over 260km in six months to reunite with its previous owner. The game is more faithful to both source materials than the previous title.

name: White Heart Baekgu 3
summary: Third in a trilogy of South Korean platformers based on the animated film Hayan Maeum Baekgu, itself based on the 1993 news story surrounding the dog which travelled over 260km in six months to reunite with its previous owner. This entry has almost nothing to do with the previous titles, and received official localisation in the CIS under the name "Rex 2." Also includes an electronic pet application.

name: Wheel of Fortune: New Second Edition
summary: Based on the original Wheel of Fortune game by ShareData, the New Second Edition includes more than a thousand new phrases to guess.

name: Where the Demon Lurks
summary: Where the Demon Lurks is a mostly kinetic SFW visual novel with a few branching parts, and some occasional fan service.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
What the Fortress!?
summary: A Tower Defense game where you carve the path for your enemies and you form the terrain. Unlock 20+ Towers, fight against 30 types of enemies and choose from 5 different ground tiles.

name: Whimsical Heroes
summary: Fight tactical turn-based battles in the cartoonish world full of whimsical creatures. Wisely positioning your heroes on a hex grid and combining their unique abilities is the key to victory and obtaining the precious bubbles.

name: What Has Come Before
summary: What Has Come Before is a perspective-driven puzzle game set in an eerie and stylish black and white Lynchian world. Stuck in limbo with only hearing and vision to guide, players must utilize clever changes in perspective to move forward.

name: Whisky Bottler
summary: Learn the magic of whisky. Discover the aromas in old barrels. Visit Scottish distilleries, get to know their secrets, and start your own in the future. Create your own exceptional whisky. Find out whether you can be successful on the luxurious liquor market. Become a whisky bottler!

name: Whack First!: Fight the Moles
summary: The moles are trying to destroy the farm. Use your hammer to hit them and save the infected crop. Get the highest scores and take on your friends.

name: Whirlycat
summary:
What’s better than 100 cats in your house? Whirlycat in your pocket!
Whirly the cat has his paws on the top-secret GW-70 Helicopter prototype and is hiding out deep in the woods! This crazy cat needs your piloting skill to carry out his “Whirly Domination” plan for snagging bones from the Mountain Rescue Dog team.

name: What If George Washington Was a Girl?
summary: An historical epic following Georgia Washington in her attempt to stop the dark musician Mozart from destroying Antarctica.

name: Why I was Born
summary: "When I noticed, I was born on its own." This is a game that simulates the life of an ordinary man by rolling the ball.

name: Whack Your Zombie Neighbour: Sports Edition
Where Winds Meet
summary: Where Winds Meet is an open world RPG set in the Ten Kingdoms period of medieval China. You take on the role of a swordsman who has grown up during war and conflict. Gameplay includes a mix of sword fighting, martial arts, and magic combat.

name: White Mirror
summary: A hardcore platformer, intended for speedrunners to try to beat as fast as possible !

name: What da Yak
summary: What da Yak (pronounce as What the Yak) is an retro 90's action/arcade game inspired by a classic Thai gaint story. Yak in Thai means 鬼 in Japanese. The story in the game is based on memories of old Thai culture related to a giant creature. This game is designed and developed by Nutthaput Chuasuwan. He is a 4th year student at the Department of Interactive Design and Game Development, College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology, Dhurakij Pundit University.

name: Who's Who?
summary: Enjoy an intense game of wits with friends all around the world! Experience a sense of thrill and achievement by becoming the last survivor. Play different modes including "Police and Thief" and "Where`s everybody?".

name: When We Lost
summary: "When We Lost" is a classic horror game in first person perspective. Some day children were missing in mysterious circumstances. There were many rumors and stories about how many people could have been lost, but no one believed in what had really happened so our hero He decided to go take pictures to prove that it was an attempt to hide government experiments.

name: Where's the Bathroom!?!
summary: This is a comedic/run and gun game where your overall objective is to find the bathroom, you will battle many different types of enemies on various unique levels! Grab and gun and go have some fun!

name: When in Rome 1: Accounting for Taste
summary:
Manhattan, May, 1954.

The last few years, you've settled into a routine. You work at the bank, you go home, you occasionally have dinner with your mother. It is all acceptably ordinary.

One day a strange creature crosses your path, and disrupts the schedule entirely.

A work of interactive fiction by Emily Short.

name: When Day Breaks
summary: "When Day Breaks" is a short SOMA mod that aims to turn S. D. Locke's Proposal from the SCP Foundation Wiki into a playable story, featuring the key events, and some additional ones, with my own interpretation on the environments.

name: Whacky Park
summary: 恭喜你通过面试，成为这个乐园的检票处的一员，在这动荡的时代，有一份工作是十分令人羡慕的...

name: White : The Hero's Return
summary: Just a hardcore, lore-deep RPG based on your choices.

name: Whispering Abyss
summary: Whispering Abyss is a top-down rogue-like in the setting of Lovecraftian horror. Play as Grace as you navigate the treacherous abyss and rid Dululth of its monsters with your trusty dual revolvers! Descend into the madness in a procedurally generated abyss, collecting loot to aid your quest.

name: Whim
summary: On the surface, a 2D platformer right out of the '80s video game playbook. The eponymous Whim walks and jumps his way through static rooms, avoiding the baddies and other hazards, and collecting various items. But this game is so much more than that...

name: When Honor Dies
summary: In this hack and slash, action-packed single-player adventure, honor has failed you you. Your ideals have crumbled. Will you give up or take back what was stolen from you? Answer the call of the Dark Spirit and take your revenge. Do not let hatred consume you. That is what happens When Honor Dies.

name: Wheeled Warriors: Ultimate Destruction
summary: Even if civilization is gone, humanity still loves high-speed racing. In Wheeled Warriors you drive through the post-apocalyptic streets of destroyed cities. Build your own savage war machine by choosing the right weapons, armor, customizations and more.

name: Whom the Telling Changed
summary: The people had always gathered on moonless nights to hear the stories, since the time of their ancestors' ancestors. The heat of the fire and the glow in the storyteller's eyes made the past present, and the path to the future clear. The power in the telling was immense, subtle, divine. What man would dare subvert it?

name: Wheel of Fortune
summary: Wheel of Fortune is a TV game based upon the hit game show Wheel of Fortune. It was released in 2005 by Jakks Pacific. The game is just Wheel of Fortune but it features a spinning wheel. You can either spin with the wheel or press B for a random spin.

name: What's Your Emergency
summary: What's your emergency is a game where you take the boots of a 911 operator. In it you will be presented with different emergencys, your task is aid the victims. You will be able to do this through dialogs with the victim and using the new computer application called "Emergency_Manager_2.0".

name: Where is Earth?
summary: Where is Earth is a top-down vehicular combat game. Traverse planets, evading threats and obstacles, in search of your crew. Gather resources to assemble upgrades, landing vehicles, space craft, weaponry and support modules to aid you in your fight against an unknown enemy.

name: Whack Your Boss
summary: Whack Your Boss was the original interactive cartoon that started the series that gave players the ability to take out their frustrations by making selections inside the animation. Whack your boss, try all seven ways.

name: Who is Here?
summary: Who Is Here is a single player indie horror game. You have to get out of the apartment, where something strange is happening.

name: Wheel of Innocence
summary: Wheel of Innocence is a lesbian visual novel where you peer into the life of a disabled high schooler named Reina.

name: What They Don't Sea
summary: Traverse the depths of the ocean in this beautiful 2D pixel platformer, but be sure to watch your air levels! What They Don't Sea has a wonderful mix of beautiful and creepy environments, with drops of humor delivered by charming ocean creatures.

name: Where did I put it?
summary: A tiny game about trying to find something.

name: Where I Lived
summary: A game documenting the various homes and stories Lee Tusman had accumulated over his life.

name: When Bricks Fly
summary: When Bricks Fly is a base building physics sandbox game where you must build structures to survive through the harshest of disasters.

name: What a Ball
summary: What a Ball - A different kind of ball racing game. Follow Blue's adventure running against more than 600 Balls racing together. Be the Ball: Crash, jump, bounce and run up to 300 Km per hour. It's very challenging and hardcore game, if don't believe us, just try it.

name: White Mourning: Museum In Pale
summary: White Mourning: Museum In Pale is a fan game of Disco Elysium, based on White Mourning (the DE fanart book). You can wander around as a pixel RPG character. Meet with familiar people, review your familiar past, and collect all kinds of artwork.

name: Wheel of Naughtiness
summary: The Wheel of naughtiness is a casual hentai game that combines visual novels and interactive animations, experience love story with 6 girls. Unlock gallery mode to relive the good night.

name: Wheels of War
summary: The Wheels of War is a Warfare Game. The unique way of war Fight between multiple vehicles. Players explore the world and survive with their team. Plenty of game modes are available to play with cross-platform.

name: Where is a Toilet!?
summary: Where is a toilet!? is a simple running-platformer game using only move and jump key.Player is reach to the Goal avoiding obstacles. Player also can get a combo bonus through stomping villains.Two or more combo bonus get player faster and invincible, it is a important key to the victory.

name: What's Updog
summary: Our hero Pup wakes up one day overhearing their human talking about Updog. What is Updog? Is it food? Is it a place? Pup has to know! Set out on a journey around town and find out the answer to this very mysterious question. What's Updog? is a point and click adventure with 2D overworld exploration made for the original Game Boy!

name: When Tails Gets Bored
summary:
When Tails gets Bored is a fangame that was created in the website Sonic Vegemite.

The player controls just as Sonic plays in the Mega Drive titles. Sonic must find the Special Stages to gain knowledge about why tails is bored. Beat 4 special stages to get the true ending. Besides that, the player must traverse through 9 zones (2 secret) and complete whatever hoax Estel has in store for him.

name: Whatsamusic
summary: An online multiplayer name-that-tune party game in which players listen to a series of song clips and try to guess the title and/or artist of each song as quickly as they can.

name: Where is a Toilet!?
summary: 'Where is a Toilet!?' is a simple running-platformer game using only move and jump key. Player is reach to the Goal avoiding obstacles. Player also can get a combo bonus through stomping villains. Two or more combo bonus get player faster and invincible, it is a important key to the victory.

name: Who Knocks
summary: Who Knocks is a first person psychological horror game that will make your nightmares come true. You have just moved into a new home. Welcome the presences that will knock at your door. Solve puzzles, explore the environment and fight your nightmares.

name: Where's Worldo?!
summary:
Where's Worldo is an interactive geographical deduction game. On each tour you will be presented with a number of Google Street View panoramas, and it's your job to pinpoint on the map where in the world you think each location is.

The closer you are, and the fewer guesses you take, the better your score. To find Worldo at his location you need to be within 200m of his location!

If you get stuck you can use one of the unique Powerups to help you, including Ask a Local, Radius and Laser.

If you guess correctly, there's a chance Worldo will bring you a memento of the country he visited, such as a wildlife photo, activity, or souvenir. There are over 1000 of these to collect!

name: Wheel of Time MUD
summary:
The Wheel of Time MUD is a time-honored multi-user dungeon. It’s an interactive text-based game that has been enjoyed for free by web users since 1993. It is the oldest and most popular online game set in the Wheel of Time world.

Game mechanics can involve strategy, teamwork, puzzle-solving, timing, and knowledge gathering; but what you choose to do is up to you. There are a wide variety of players that you may encounter in your travels, but nobody is putting you into a box. Fancy being a Channeler from the White Tower? Ta’veren from Emond’s Field? A bloodthirsty trolloc from Thakan’dar? You can be as many, or as few, as you wish.

name: Whisker Squadron: Survivor
summary: Wreak vengeance with your elite craft on waves of Swarm bugs, who are hellbent on killing you and everyone you love. Harvest their guts for scrap and earn a deliciously varied array of upgrades. Beat the last wave if you have the skill, then strap in and try again in this survival roguelite shooter.

name: While I'm Still Your Eyes
summary:
A game about emotional abuse.

You are back at the waterfront. They are spilling everything out onto you. Drink up bitch. Good girl. For now, I am still your eyes.

name: Whack A Hoe
summary: In this fun shooter game you aren't shooting bullets, NO! You're shooting Dildo's of all shapes, sizes and from the character that you choose! The object of the game is to be the leader with the highest score. Perfect your angle, wait for the power meter to get to the top (full) and WHACK AWAY.

name: What Heart Heard Of, Ghost Guessed
summary: "What Heart Heard Of, Ghost Guessed" is a puzzle-driven, parser-based gothic horror story with a unique command set.

name: Which Naruto Character Are You?
summary: A desktop simulator game about taking a Naruto character personality quiz.

name: What in Hell is Bad?
summary: What in Hell is Bad? is an adult defense otome game for mobile devices.

name: Whack-A-Wolf
summary: A Whac-A-Mole clone with Little Red Riding Hood and the Big Bad Wolf.

name: Whirlybird
summary: Whirlybird is a game bundled in the Google Play Games app.

name: White Water
summary: Defeat the enemy as quickly as possible

name: What is Snowman Made of?
summary: An atmospheric mini game that let's you explore a snowcapped yard in which you build your very own snowman.

name: What Belongs?Find Hidden Words
summary:
Follow the given hints to reach the hidden word.
The less tips you use, the more points you collect.
The new dimension in the word puzzles.
Are you ready for sleeplessness?

name: Where is Ploppy?
summary: Where is Ploppy?, a colorful fun hidden object game for everyone, is designed with your child's safety in mind. In addition to Apple's guidelines for children's games, we go one step further and firmly believe that any data about your children belongs exclusively to you and your children and should stay that way. Therefore, Where is Ploppy? does not store any of your children's data! There are additional security mechanisms in place to prevent your child from being routed out of the app while playing. This means that as soon as a link is called up, such as to rate the game, a short math problem must be solved beforehand. Furthermore, the game is also designed for the colorblind and children who can't read yet.

name: WhatsSlot Halloween
summary: Slot Diamond Season for Halloween!!

name: What's the Logo?: Guess the Company Brand Word Game
summary:
Think you know your clothing, car, tech and snack brands? Test your knowledge as you try to unscramble the letters of company logos displayed in the pic.
So you can identify Google, Nike and McDonalds by their symbols. So can all your friends. Compete with them head to head in the leaderboard by connecting to facebook. And if you're feeling stuck, fell free to reach out to them or your Twitter followers. And there's always those in-game powerups.

name: What's the Baby Animal?
summary: Everyone loves Baby Animals, but how well do you know them? What’s The Baby Animal? is all about kittens, puppies, chicks, ducklings and other adorable animals.

name: What's the Movie?
summary:
Think you're the biggest movie junkie?
Test your knowledge on more than 290+ levels as you try to unscramble the letters to find the title of movie displayed in the pic.
Feeling stuck? Reach out to your friends and followers, or use the in game powerups for help.

name: What's the Year
summary: What’s The Year is a new quiz where your knowledge can be tested. What do you know about ww1 or ww2? What do you know in general? With this fantastic quiz you can show off your skills and how good you really are. See who gets the highest score among your friends.

name: Wheels on Fire
summary:
Fasten your seat belts and be prepared for a high-speed-experience. One simple goal: Go as far as possible. Step on the gas. Avoid the other cars on the street. Feel the power of speed.
The game is fully controlled with the accelerometer.
Do you have what it takes for THIS experience...?

name: Whiskers
summary: Size is the name of the game in Whiskers. Collect kitty food to grow bigger, and use four unique powerups to steal size from your friends. Become as big as the screen and you win! Pick from over 50 mustaches for your adorable pixel kitten and then do battle with up to three of your friends.

name: Who's the Celeb?
summary:
Think you know your athletes, actors, and music stars? Test your knowledge as you try to unscramble the letters of these celebrities displayed in the pic.
Do you have what it takes to hang with the world's most powerful elite like Kim Kardashian, Brad Pitt and LeBron James? Let's find out.

name: What I Heard
summary:
You are a Lady’s maid to Lady Catherine Holloway, the daughter of a wealthy and locally prominent family in the village of Thrumshire.

Lady Elizabeth Holloway, Catherine’s mother, has been taken ill, much to the suspicion of Lady Catherine. You are asked to a private meeting where she tells you of her suspicions, she believes her mother is being poisoned by someone in the house.

You are to interrogate the staff, listen to household conversations and find clues, you have 3 days to find out as much as you can, then you must accuse someone of the crime.

name: Where Did the Humans Go?
summary: A pilot descends on a planet where something strange is going on. When he arrives at a scientist's camp, there's no trace of humans. Only robots are left and their behaviour is strange. Where did the humans go?

name: Where's Mom
summary:
Peacefully in the autumn forest lives you, mom and sick sis.
One day you must watch over your sick sister so mom can leave to brew a potion for her. But she never comes back, where's mom?

name: White Tiles Master
summary: An addicting game that tests your reflexes against time and movement. Test your speed and accuracy with this simple and fun game!

name: What if Adventure Time was a 3D Anime
summary: What if Adventure Time was a 3D Anime is a third person action adventure fan game, developed by Mike Inel.

name: Whackerball
summary: Whackerball is a twin-stick shooter roguelite with Breakout inspired mechanics. Use your paddle to keep your ball airborne and dodge enemy bullets as you defeat waves of enemies.

name: What Do You Know?
summary: Show what you know in this trivia game. Click the correct answer to earn points. Earn MORE points by answering quickly.

name: White Flower
summary: White Flower is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: What Lies Under
summary: What Lies Under is a fishing game taking place in calm and relaxing waters full of fishes, treasures and more.

name: When the Devil Takes Hold
summary: When The Devil Takes Hold promises to be a bone-chilling journey into the heart of fear, with immersive first-person gameplay, a deep storyline, and a heart-pumping atmosphere.

name: Whisper Mountain Outbreak
summary: An isometric co-op PvE multiplayer survival horror game. It's 1998, and an ancient curse has been unleashed, trapping everyone on Mt. Bisik. When a mysterious fog appeared, people started hearing whispers and seeing monsters. Fight, explore, solve puzzles, and figure out a way to escape... together!

name: White Sands
summary: As a commander of the Union, a semi state organization with military and research potential, your goal is to help humanity rebuild. Modern military technology will give you an edge over the bandits, but the task will be far from an easy one.

name: Wheel Stars
summary: Welcome to a new racing universe. Wheel Stars is the first free-to-play battle royale multiplayer racing game of its kind. A game where you compete and cooperate with your squad to win challenging and fun competitions.

name: Whispers of Gold
summary: Step into the world of Whispers of Gold, a choice-driven mystery adventure visual novel! Navigate the medieval free city as hired dagger Arthur on a quest to find a nobleman’s abducted daughter.

name: Whispers in the Moss
summary: Whispers in the Moss is a retro JRPG with some of the most beautiful and detailed text-based graphics you've ever seen. Experience an epic story, a fun turn-based battle system, and a full custom soundtrack.

name: Who I See
summary: A second-person mystery point-and-click, in which the story is told through the NPCs describing the strange actions of your strange main character.

name: Whack an Office Jerk
summary:
Whack An Office Jerk & Boss is a free game, your chance to whack em all over the head, and experience a satisfying calm peaceful feeling....
after you kick some major butt!!!

name: Whispers of West Grove
summary: A heart-pounding adventure taking place in the twisted town of West Grove. Play as a patient trapped in a world where dream and reality begin to blur. Use light to solve puzzles, reveal hidden items, and transform objects to explore in a way like never before.

name: When Sword Sinks Into Flowers
summary: Ford Gillia Kingdom, where the ancient magicians' legend still remains. On a certain day Adelite, belonging to the kingdom's chivalric order was cast a death-promising curse by a man who identifies himself as a "magician". The feud between knights and magicians is beyond epochs...

name: Who Run the City
summary: Who Run The City is a Third-Person Multiplayer funny game where gangsters are doing illegal stuff (stealing money, selling drugs ...) and the police have to stop them.

name: Wholesome Monster Girl Academia
summary: A wholesome high school experience with monster girls set in a Catholic school. Befriend and try to romance with a harpy girl, dragon girl, slime girl, succubus, or a vampire. Along the way, learn and apply lessons from your faith to improve your relationship with God and the girls.

name: White Out Survival
summary:
White Out Survival is the first-ever survival strategy game to center on a glacial apocalypse theme. Fascinating mechanics and intricate details await you to explore!
The catastrophic decline in global temperatures has wreaked havoc on human society. Those who have made it out of their crumbling homes are now faced with a new set of challenges: vicious blizzards, ferocious beasts, and opportunistic bandits looking to prey on their despair.

name: While We Wait Here
summary:
Share thoughts and hot food with your last ever clients, as you wait for the world to end.

Tackling themes of time, the armageddon and the intricacies of human psychology, While We Wait Here promises to be as deep as it does captivating, as players must juggle between the mundanity of flipping burger patties and pouring soda to the frighteningly serious threat that lies outside the diner’s doors.

name: Wheelie King 5
summary: Online & Offline modes Customize bikes. Upgrade bikes. Wheelies, Endos, Real stunts & Drifting. Manual & Automatic gears.

name: When Destiny Comes Knocking
summary: When Destiny Comes Knocking is an Otome game by Voltage Inc. You just moved to a new housing area in Tokyo and after praying for love at a local shrine, you have suddenly become popular with guys!? Who will you pick?

name: Who Are Ya
summary: Each day brings a new footballer to guess in this unique football quiz

name: What A Legend
summary: What A Legend is a hand-drawn sandbox adult visual novel with 2D animations and a large cast of female characters to seduce and romance. You play as a young man who has a special gift that might be the key to save the kingdom from its corrupt leaders.

name: Where is My Glasses ?
summary: Direct a little fuzzy creature to find his glasses, because he could not see very well, but this will not be easy! You have to put the launcher in the right place, and every launcher have a way to use it, you should avoid the Red Blocks, and help him to find his glasses safely.

name: Whack-A-Dalek
summary:
Classic game of whack-a-mole but with something you love to hate to give a good whack to.

Published by ScifiSlacker.com.

name: Wheelie 2
summary:
Wheelie is back and now, he have found the love of his life.
He needs your brainpower to reach his goal.

name: Which Way Up: Galaxy Games
summary:
Which Way Up: Galaxy Games is a family friendly party game that gives unique freedom of movement by allowing you to run on walls and ceilings, orbit around planets, or fall across entire levels by manoeuvring through gravity fields.

Before The Universe existed, the Space Sprites banded together one-by-one to see a dream come to fruition: the dream of life itself. As The Universe began to take shape, so too did space. But space is unpredictable, and creating life is tiresome work. So, the Sprites took it upon themselves to create a pastime. The Galaxy Games.

Each event features its own unique bite-sized challenge where up to 4 players can compete. Eject your friends into space as you race across gravity fields, score a goal with an entire moon, leap across planets to escape a black hole, and capture and hold zodiacal constellations.

name: Whiteout Survival
summary:
Whiteout Survival is a survival strategy game to center on a glacial apocalypse theme. Fascinating mechanics and intricate details await you to explore!

The catastrophic decline in global temperatures has wreaked havoc on human society. Those who have made it out of their crumbling homes are now faced with a new set of challenges: vicious blizzards, ferocious beasts, and opportunistic bandits looking to prey on their despair.

As the head of the last city in these icy wastes, you are the only hope for humanity's continued existence. Can you successfully guide the survivors through the ordeal of adapting to the hostile environment and re-establishing civilization? The time for you to rise to the occasion is now!

name: What's it? Flags
summary: This is quiz game full of fun that consists on guessing the names of hundreds of flags around the world.

name: While the Whole World Laughs
summary:
She was alone in her room, drawing the night away. She could hear something faintly in the distance, it was music. She wondered where it was coming from.

Draw the world into view to help her navigate it.

name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego?
summary: Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego? is a game that tests the player's knowledge about geography and general knowledge about different countries. Missions will begin with a treasure being stolen and the player flying to that location. A time limit counts down while they must search the area and interview witnesses to find enough clues to figure out what country the thief flew to next. The player always has a limited selection (usually three or four) of flights available in any given country. This process is repeated until either the villain is found or time expires and they are able to get away.

name: Where Is My Crown?
summary:
The kingdom host the biggest party of the year to celebrate the king inauguration. But, the king had too many honey and lost his crown....
Where is my crown? is a new procedurally generated deduction game and you can play it anywhere only needing your smart logic and thinking.
Where is my crown? is a deduction game where players must explore and investigate other character to find the crown.

name: Where We Remain
summary: Where We Remain is an adventure set on a desert island, shown from a zoomed out, almost top-down view. The content is procedurally-generated and the setup of the island is different for each session. At first glance it seems similar to the 8 and 16 bit Zelda games, but it only borrows that shape to tell its story.

name: Where Is My Cat?
summary: Where is My Cat s a purr-fectly delightful casual game with charming graphics and relaxing gameplay where you help a cute little kitty escape from various obstacles and challenges. Navigate through different levels and use your problem-solving skills to find a way out.

name: When It Rains, I Want to Disappear off Somewhere
White Wolf: Darkside Chronicles
summary: Enter Darkside of "White Wolf" story how evil got trapped in chest in snow cave. When you opened chest you felled into magic dream realm spell to enter "White Wolf" mind to corrupt into "Dark Wolf. Let evil adventure begin!

name: White Wolf: Treasure Hunter
summary: Action-Adventure & Strategy saving your world from Dark world that you unleashed. Quest though 5 element temples, collect items, and throw items. Unlock the hidden treasure shadow card castle.

name: Whacky Ball
summary:
In Whacky Ball, your device's camera transports you into a world of challenging ball games. Using motion recognition, you whack the balls virtually on the screen using your hands or head as if you are really there.
Whack the birds and other flying objects before they whack into your ball. Score three times in a row to win bonus points.

name: What is Sleeping in My Room?
summary: Experience the hunt for the Monster living in your room in this Visual Novel experience. Your choices will determine the fate of both you and the Monster. Will you figure out what the Monster really is?

name: Whisker Witchery
summary: Take the role of a cursed witch as she tried to become human once more! Navigate the cottage of your rival to locate the ingredients needed for the potion, avoiding her guardians and falling to the floor far below!

name: Whitewater VR: Extreme Kayaking Adventure
summary: Get ready to paddle through some of the world's wildest, and most challenging rapids in breathtaking VR. With stunning graphics, realistic physics, and heart-pumping action, you'll race against the clock as you navigate through wild waters filled with obstacles and surprises.

name: Where is Agnes?
summary: "Where is Agnes?" It's a mix of a point & click game with a simple combat system and visual novel with puzzles. Agnes was in an unknown place. Where is she? Explore the dark world, communicate with its unusual inhabitants, solve secrets.

name: Who is the New Maid?
summary: There is a rumor that the new maid is a lesbian. And a slut. You're Stephanie, the oldest of three sisters, and it is your responsibility to make sure the new maid fits in at the manor.

name: WhereTaken USA
summary:
The aim of the game is to guess what US state the photo was taken in.
If you guess incorrectly, the game will tell you how far away you are, and displays an arrow that points in the direction of the correct US state.

name: WhereTaken Classic
summary:
The aim of the game is to guess what country/region the photo was taken in.
If you guess incorrectly, the game will tell you how far away you are, and displays an arrow, that points in the direction of the correct country/region.
A new WhereTaken will be available everyday!

name: Which Way
summary: The player controls a dog with a baby on his back, and must avoid obstacles.

name: Who Stole Me?
summary:
Someone stole me and my friends and put us in bubbles!
Match colors and set us free in this addictive physics puzzler.

name: When God Left Us
summary: When God Left Us is a first-person horror game set in a corrupted world, a world that God abandoned before creating ours. Pronouncing the name of that forsaken place will open a portal to its grounds. Despite the warnings, you dare to try this yourself.

name: WhiteClothes
summary: WhiteClothes is a RPG in which you play cute monsters on their mission to uphold peace!

name: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Ep.2
summary: EP2 proceeds from the point of view of Seo-yeon. Seo-yeon comes to Yeondu High School on the night of March 14, 2001 to confirm the truth about her father's mysterious death, who was a Korean language teacher at Yeondu High School, and her father's souls in order to send to the heaven.

name: What the Car?
summary: You’re a car with legs! Race through hundreds of unique levels: jump, fly with jetpacks, climb tall buildings, deliver packages, and so pretty much everything you can’t do in a normal racing game.

name: Who Wants to Strip this Babe? Streamer Girl
summary: The combination of the well-known TV show with the best genre of games on earth.

name: White Night Dream
summary: White Night Dream is a card-based strategy rogue-lite game where a girl chases after a runaway cat on the streets at midnight. The game cleverly simulates the short yet long night through a simple card-flipping gameplay and a variety of interesting build combinations.

name: When Night Comes
summary: When Night Comes is an immersive and spine-chilling horror game. If you're a fan of survival horror games and want to test your skills against a terrifying demonic force, then this game is definitely for you. Are you brave enough to face the Entity? Play When Night Comes and find out!

name: When the Strawberry Muffin Ate a Goth
summary: This is a short story about two girls meeting one night, taking a liking to each other, and exploring themselves further. Weighing in at around ~7.5k words, it is more akin to a kinetic novel, except for the lack of images.

name: Where the Sea Meets the Sky
summary: Where the Sea Meets the Sky is a narrative-driven puzzle game about death and grief. Players take on the role of Susu as she uncovers a hidden secret held by Grandma after the passing of Grandpa. Susu will help Grandma work through her grief and come to a different understanding of death, drawing from her perspective and memories as a little child.

name: Wheelie Life
summary: Welcome to Wheelie Life 2, the best online wheelie game yet. Enjoy the online mode, where you can create or join rooms to play with your friends and more players.

name: Wheat Fairy of Daya
summary: Play as a wheat fairy, using the magical energy of the wheat field to dispel the threats of wheat! Combine different skills to make your own attack style! And let the wheat grow and harvest smoothly under the test of other nature fairies.

name: Whale Rock Games: Immersive Puzzles Bundle
WheelTris
summary:
Wheeltris defines a new genre of casual games. Its is inspired by charming clockwork apparatuses such as clocks, automatons and other steam-punk masterpieces. The game provides unique experience you have never seen before. It combines vivid and mesmerizing visuals, addictive gameplay and easy controls.

Draw lines of wheels. Collect bonuses. Deal with obstacles and dangers. Meet puzzles. And much more.

name: Where's the Floor?
summary: Roll around to uncover the floor and find the finish. Collect gems to style your ball, upgrade to expert controls, unlock camera zoom, and get crazy glow floors!

name: What Friends Are For
summary: What Friends Are For is a puzzle platformer for the original Game Boy. It was developed in GB Studio for Game Boy Showdown 2023. Switch between friendly and unfriendly modes to use your enemies to solve puzzles and platforming challenges... or are they your friends? The game features 5 unique levels lovingly made in a week by Shin, with an awesome dynamic soundtrack from Beatscribe.

name: Whispers of the Luminaries
summary:
Whispers of the Luminaries is an idol-themed murder mystery visual novel where you balance social life with detective work.

Investigate, obtain clues and deduce the killer.

name: Where is Mr. Cloud
summary: Hello. My name is Toprak, i lost my plush cat, can you help me find it?

name: Whimre
summary: whimRE is an atmospheric open-world adventure. Complete missions to escape through a portal while surviving against hostile enemies with limited resources using various weapons or stealth tactics. Choose from 3 sets, each with unique advantages. Strategize, fight, and find your way off the island!

name: White Blade
summary: Strategic turn-based combat, utilizing various complementary skills to deal with enemy attack patterns.

name: Wheel of Fortune
summary: Be an actual contestant on Wheel of Fortune! Give the wheel a spin and see if you can solve a variety of clever puzzles, specially written by the TV show's producers. Don't just sit at home and watch - be there and play!

name: Where’s My Water? The Mystery Duck’s Story
summary: The Mystery Duck's Story is an optional In-App Purchase that puts a magical twist on Swampy's Story. The regular Swampy Ducks are replaced with the teleporting and levitating Mystery Duck, or the water consuming Mega Duck, or a crew of ducklings.

name: Where’s My Water? Cranky’s Story
summary: Cranky's Story is an optional In-App Purchase that has four chapters and eight challenge sets. In this story, the player helps Cranky clean Algae off his food. Cranky is the sewer's most hungry Alligator. Cranky is relying on an old pipe that puts out Poison Water to clean away the Algae.

name: Where’s My Water? Allie’s Story
summary: Allie's Story is an optional In-App Purchase that has four chapter and challenges. In this story, the player must help Allie with her broken organ. Allie is the sewer's most creative and talented alligator. Unfortunately, the Other alligators have broken the steam pipe line to her Piano.

name: While the Iron’s Hot
summary: Reforge a blacksmith's village on an isle of the land's finest artisans! Step into the boots of an expert smith for a crafty adventure filled with mystery and charm. Explore the land of Ellian, and prove that a hammer, anvil, and your wits can overcome any challenge.

name: White Hearts
summary: White Hearts is a Ren'Py visual novel set at the Ecole Lyceé Saint Louis de Gonzague, prestigious university in Paris, where Rosaire is the only male student. Players holding a White Hearts NFT have access to the game via the token gated website.

name: While Waiting
summary: A transformative adventure exploring the art of waiting. Clear the game by doing nothing, but discover the power of acceptance and patience in 100+ situations from birth to death. Learn to embrace life as you wait.

name: While Waiting My Turn
summary: Discover the joy of building tiny structures with board game pieces in this relaxing game. Stack and create unique buildings. Complete optional tasks that fuel your creativity. Construct whatever you want – no puzzles to solve, no races to win.

name: Wholesome: Heartdrawn
summary: Wholesome: Heartdrawn is a Turn-Based RPG and adventure game about Lyra, who creates her world to imagine her memories to escape from some things. Explore real and imagined worlds, and go on adventures. Lead Lyra and help her handle everything.

name: White-Hot Puyolympic!
summary: White-Hot PuyoLympic is a sports game in which Arle and Witch battle in several varied events.

name: White-Hot! Puyolympic! in Bazaru
summary: PuyoLympic in Basa~ru is an expansion of the Puyo Picking game featured in PuyoLympic.

name: Whispike Survivors: Sword of the Necromancer
summary: Cultivate the strongest monster in this horde survivor farming game! Fight against waves of creatures to beef up your Whispike and use its seeds to create even stronger hybrids!

name: Wheel World
summary: Dive into Wheel World as Kat, a rider chosen by ancient cycling spirits. Race elite teams, trick out your bike, and perform the long overdue Great Shift ritual to save a universe on the brink! Your bike is your destiny.

name: Whale Fall
summary: "Whale Fall" is a single-player exploration game where you control various marine creatures to experience the magnificent cycle of life in the vast ocean.

name: Whole Lotta Lies
summary: The game follows a pig named Pixie and her friends, who were torn away from their loving mothers as babies and are being raised on a filthy, barbaric farm. They need your help to stay away from the cruel workers, who are hell-bent on shooting sick and injured pigs and sending the rest on a terrifying trip to the slaughterhouse.

name: Who Is Your Prince? In the Rich School
summary: A visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: What Remains of Us
summary: When you left the capital to escape the clutches of the sun god's council, you hoped that you could put your past behind you and start anew. Unfortunately for you, pasts always have a way of catching up to people; and yours just happened to come in the package of a bleeding man at your doorway.

name: Who Are You!?
summary: 'Who Are You!?' is a strong narrative first person sci-fi psychological horror videogame, where you will play as Ray Roswell, traveling through his distorted memories and solving puzzles to understand what is real about his wife’s disappearance 20 years ago.

name: What's Cooking?: Tasty Chef
summary: Tie your apron and sharpen your knives – it’s time for a crazy cooking adventure in What's Cooking?: Tasty Chef! Starting as an amateur cook with a small kitchen, you’ll combine ingredients to create over 1000 recipes and serve delicious dishes to hungry customers. Customize your restaurant, upgrade your kitchen and improve your skills to become the world’s greatest master chef!

name: White Flame Inna: Daughter of the Void
summary: 2d hand drawn female protagonist metroidvania/soulslike game

name: White Desert
summary:
She's the girl of his dreams.

White Desert tells the story of Monoe's childhood friend Monoru and explores the deep bond they share together. This tale is not about making choices, but rather about creating an atmosphere and living in the moment.

name: Where Is Sarah?
summary: You shall look for Sarah that faded out of your whole memory. The circumstance and unknown guy who often interrupts you would bother you continuously. Chronic drinking and overtime works had destructed your mind, but you will get back your memories and your wife, Sarah, too.

name: Wheat Harvest Paradox
summary: A psx style game where you harvest with a harvester. However, you do not live in an ordinary world, you live in a very gloomy and old giant city. Where all the inhabitants of this city are stuck in a time loop. Every day the direction of time changes. It can go both forward and in the opposite direction.

name: Why
summary:
Why?

Why someone like you?

Why?

name: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Ep.3
summary: Episode 3 of the last story of 'White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies' takes place when Ji-min Yoo, a freshman at Yeondu High School, returns to the school on the night of March 14, 2001. She tries to send So-young Han's older sister, Na-young Han's soul to the heaven.

name: Where is 2010?
summary: Help Santa find the New Year, it seems that kid got lost somewhere again!

name: When the Light Dies
summary: When the Light Dies is a survival game with roguelite elements set in a desolate, frozen wilderness. Step into a murky world of shadow and obscurity as a lone survivor fighting to keep the darkness and the horrors that lurk within at bay.

name: Whittingham Asylum: The Investigation
summary: Prepare to immerse yourself in a bone-chilling adventure. Unravel the truth, face your fears, and expose the hidden darkness that lies within Whittingham Asylum. The answers await you, brave investigator!

name: Who Did It?
summary: Who Did It? Is a detective puzzle-game. Your job is to read the given case files to find out who the murderer is! Do you have what it takes to master all cases and close them all for good?

name: Where I Belong
summary: How hard is becoming friends with others? Explore the challenging dynamics of high school relationships in "Where I Belong," a compelling visual novel that delves into the complexities of friendship, toxicity, and the search for one's place in a crowded world.

name: Where Beasts Were Born
summary: Where Beasts Were Born is an experimental Action-RPG with evolving creatures. As the creatures fight the players, they use a genetic algorithm to evolve unique, stronger evolutionary stages, including body, stats and brain - procedurally!

name: Whispered Promises: 14 Days of Love with Anna
summary: This game is a cohabitation and management simulation where you live together with your beloved childhood friend. Enjoy your free time with Anna during the 14-days break!

name: What?!
summary: What?! is a single-player mystery game that focuses on its compact story and unconventional solutions. Players will take on the role of Pat Irvin, a ditzy private investigator struggling to maintain his family business.

name: Who Killed the Streamer?
summary: Investigate the murder of a famous streamer and find out who the killer is, but beware of people who don't like you meddling.

name: What Remains
summary: What Remains is a vanilla compatible episode for Doom 2, featuring an original soundtrack. In What Remains, you will explore aquatic techbases and what lies beneath the ocean.

name: When Twilight Strikes
summary:
You are a bounty hunter.

Responsible for taking in rogue supernaturals, you work for IAOS—the international agency of supernaturals—where, alongside your best friend and partner, you two have quickly become the best hunting duo of the branch.

After a particularly tricky hunt, you brief your boss, Caine Atheron, and come back to work the next day to find that he has mysteriously disappeared overnight, the company is now in the hands of his best friend, Sebastian Mai.

And though no one else seems to question it, something tells you that there's more to the story.

With bounty cases rising at an alarming rate and a second mystery unfolding, you and your ragtag team of allies set out to find the truth.

But as you go further and further, the secrets you uncover begin to make you question: who... or what exactly are you fighting for?

name: Who Is It?
summary: How many famous people do you know? You say "Oh, I know a lot of them". Check it! The application is based on the painting "Discussing the Divine Comedy with Dante" by chinese artists Dai Dudu, Li Tiezi, and Zhang An. This extraordinary painting depicting 103 figures from world history in striking detail. If you can guess at least half of them it will be great result!

name: White Magic
summary: In White Magic, the player plays as four different characters with the goal of getting out of a maze.

name: White Middle Class Guy Simulator
summary: The most boring game ever made.

name: What the Hell
summary: ﻿What the Hell is a rogue-lite top-down shooter. A terrifying future awaits the modern world under the influence of demon lords. Choose varied features to create your own skill set and determine your gameplay style. Collect demon's souls and never stop until you become stronger than they are.

name: Whip the Worker
summary: Beat your co-worker all you want. But he won't go down either!

name: Whitestone
summary: On the 'Sunchaser's capstone voyage to the Arctic, it's smooth sailing until Jack's quarters are broken into and his friend goes missing. Unsure who to trust, Jack is forced to fight nightmares both mental and physical as he becomes the prime suspect for a terrible deed.

name: Who Wants to Be a Hypnoslut?
summary:
Want our girlboss star presenter, Priestess Synergy-12, to break into your mind in front of a live studio audience? We have great news: in Who Wants to Be a Hypnoslut, you can experience exactly that!

Answer goofy video game trivia questions, get turned into an obedient drone, and become a piece of human furniture in this new interactive erotic hypnosis experience from Nyx Goddess Games!

name: Wheelchair Tester
summary: Test a wheelchair equipped with a jet engine to see if it can handle various real-life scenarios. Rest assured, you won't need to sit in the wheelchair – we have professional crash test dummies for that.

name: What the Golf? A Hole New World
summary: Holes? In golf? We thought they would be a nice addition to the game so we added about a thousand of them (more or less). Enjoy lots of hole-some new levels that are all about holes.

name: What the Golf? It's Snowtime
summary: Complete with snowpals, moose, cars, ice cubes and pizza of course. We even added snow to make it look like golf.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: 2nd Edition
When Life Gives You Lemons
summary: From hookups to deep connections, your heart's desires bloom in this romantic tale. Life may be messy, but love makes it extraordinary.

name: What The Gravity
summary: Prepare for the electrifying space adventure as a delivery specialist in the legendary United Space Force (USF). Embark on a high-octane delivery run, navigating treacherous space battlefields, and defying all odds to ensure the success of your critical mission - before the beer gets warm.

name: Where's My Loot?
summary: Where's My Loot? is a hidden object game in a fantasy world. The loot from your last adventure was lost. Search around and find all your precious items back.

name: Whispers of an Elven Captor
summary: Whispers of an Elven Captor is an erotic visual novel. As a captive, you're questioned by elven Ayelith, eager to prove herself and protect her realm. Reluctance sparks an intimate exchange of questions, escalating to daring demands over time. From reserved to explicit, Ayelith's journey unfolds.

name: What Have You Done, Father?
summary: An atrocious scandal threatens the Catholic Church when the lifeless body of a woman is discovered in the rectory of a young priest.

name: Whipplu Special
summary: Simplistic Sharp block-sorter game.

name: Whisker Waters
summary:
Whisker Waters is the ultimate RPG adventure that blends light fantasy and the art of fishing into a mesmerizing world. As a player, you'll create and play as your very own Cat character and embark on a whimsical fishing journey like never before.

Unlike any other game, Whisker Waters makes fishing the star of the show! Use cool fishing tools to explore and catch all kinds of unique fish. Each fish has its own tricks, making it exciting and rewarding!

name: White Hat
summary: White Hat is a bullet hell roguelite where you upgrade the game, not yourself, to progressively increase the difficulty. Earn points on runs that you can use to add more waves or research gameplay modifiers. Upgrades make the game harder, but increase your score multiplier.

name: Whisper: In the Dark
summary: Embark on a vibrant 2D pixel odyssey as Whisper, an emissary of the darkness. Explore an atmospheric, nonlinear world with branching paths and hidden wonders. Engage in fast-paced combat and smooth platforming in this nostalgia-infused Metroidvania adventure.

name: Where the Two Flowers Meet
summary: An indie psychological horror visual novel about the meaning of everything that has been lost, along with the memories of our time together.

name: Whispers in Paradise
summary: "Whispers in Paradise" delves into the mysterious and supernatural journey of Emily and Sydney. When Emily's life takes an unexpected turn, her friend Sydney becomes determined to uncover the secrets lurking within Emily's haunted mansion. Exploring mansion's past, Sydney find a chilling revelation.

name: Where Serpents Ever Dwell
summary:
After the lifeless bodies of D'sparils body guards crumble and fall to the ground, for the first time in ages you feel a sense a sense of relief... as you enter the portal that finally takes you... home?

This is a challenging map for Heretic, and your gonna need to keep moving as well as taking full advantage of artifacts if you want to survive.

name: White Knight Chronicles: International EX Edition
summary: A Japan-only release of White Knight Chronicles with all of the updates already included on the disc.

name: Whamble
summary: Whamble is a multiplayer word search game where you compete with online players to find words in a letter grid. Whamble is a fun, compelling and educational word finding game!

name: Who Let The Chickens Out?
summary: Welcome to "Who Let the Chickens Out?" a fun and challenging game that puts a unique spin on solving a feathery neighbor problem! Embark on a hilarious adventure where you'll use your skills and precision to deal with pesky chickens. It's time to turn those annoying cluckers into delicious chicken leg pieces!

name: Whispered Secrets: Tying the Knot
summary: Love can burn like a flame. Can you uncover who's trying to destroy the Osmont family in time?

name: Whirlwind Magician
summary: Experience the tale of a cheerful girl and a grouchy talking hat in this charming Metroidvania, where every ability is hat-based! Throw the hat to attack enemies, teleport to him to make perilous leaps, and fly him through narrow tunnels of spikes as you escape a dangerous magic forest.

name: What Lies Beneath
summary: You have heard rumors of demonic activity in an old gothic mansion. But there's more to it than meets the eye. Time to find out... What lies beneath. What Lies Beneath is a private project made by some of the contributors in Hellevator, Skulltiverse and Solar Struggle community projects. It features 11 maps created.

name: Who is Abby
summary: You play as Tom, searching for his missing sister in this stunning first-person walking sim meets point-and-click adventure. A psychological thriller where you unravel a mystery through exploration and puzzle-solving—no horror, just suspense and intrigue as you reveal more about her disappearance.

name: Whispers Of Aether
summary: Embark on an epic journey: Create, lead, and protect your organization, while facing perilous creatures in the mystical realm of Aether. Craft, manage, explore, and purge the land of evil.

name: Whispering Fears
summary: A story about a game designer seeking to use artificial intelligence for the purpose of crafting an exceptional narrative within a game, until something unexpected happens.

name: White Room
summary: Medium sized base map with a unique concept: "keep the usual shapes but take away the textures." A biohazard outbreak at this facility adds lots of blood to the mostly white textures.

name: Wheels of Duty
summary: Fight Against other players online across multiple locations with multiple game modes. Get in your wheelchairs and fulfill your duty as soldiers!

name: Wheels of Duty: Survival Modes
summary: Team up with up to 4 people and take on AI attackers in Survival Modes

name: What Lies Behind
summary: Small metal/runic level. Comes with a custom music track from Quake64. The map source is included.

name: Who's Gonna Get the Girl?
summary: In this comedy role playing game you play the part of a young love starved man whose hopes are sparked to life by meeting a beautiful girl! Will you make it up to her apartment? Will you get to see her excusive lingerie fashion show? Will you find Love? Loads of randomly set variables so as game is different every time you play!

name: Whiskers
summary: Whiskers is a point and click horror game. You are captured by the infamous Mr. Whiskers, a twisted lunatic. Your mission is to escape from his grasp. Find your way out by collecting items and interacting with other victims.

name: White Wolf: Treasure Hunter 2
summary: Free yourself from the Dark Magic of the Mystical Chest?!

name: Who's the Traitor
summary: Who's the Traitor is a cooperative multiplayer FPS. Gather items, earn money, and work with strangers to figure out who is the traitor.

name: Why the Wrong Face?
summary: A game jam point and click adventure game about disguises and treasure.

name: Whitemare
summary: Megawad, based on "winter" theme from Russian Doom Community. The demons have decided to ruin the winter's fun of Christmas and New Year's celebrations to people, so your task is prove those stupid bastards wrong.

name: Whitemare 2
summary: Megawad, based on the results of a four speedmapping contests, held on , with such themes, as winter, thaw, precipices, and ancient civilizations. Maps were finalized some time later (some - very significantly), and several maps were built from scratch. This megawad tells us the fate of the Marine, who was going to celebrate the New Year. Suddenly, however, the monsters changed seasons' offset, and as a result - they stole the winter. We have to go through the mountains, castles and underground crypts, visit the flooded city, a lonely island and even visit the hell's edge before it will be possible to restore the normal course of the seasons. But monsters were prepared for that as well - and with the return of winter, they prepared some unpleasant surprises...

name: Whale Game Online
summary: Can You Make a Whale?It's a delightful game where you connect cute sea creatures to make them grow bigger.Single Player and Multiplayer Modes!There are both a single-player mode and a multiplayer mode for competing with friends and rivals from around the world.

name: What the Crow?!
summary: Be a crow and cause destruction in this small Playdate game.

name: Whispered Flight
summary: Embark upon a whimsical voyage as a radiant sphere of luminescence, gracefully soaring over the placid waters of a lake cradled within the ancient boughs of a mystical woodland. In pursuit of ethereal lumens, gather your scores under the watchful eyes of the stars, whilst evading the malevolent dark skulls seeking to quench your luminous essence. With a trinity of cherished lives, navigate through the verdant whispers of the old trees, to the gentle cadence of tranquility that accompanies your flight. Delight in the quaint, animated tapestry of nature’s hues as you partake in a casual contest of valor with fellow wanderers upon the leaderboard, in this gentle ballet of light against the encroaching shadow.

name: Whispers of the Citadel
summary: Immerse yourself in a kingdom's turmoil. Love, power, and destiny intertwine as you, a valiant soldier gifted with the citadel, navigate a precarious path to the throne. With the king's demise and no heir in sight, you must find a bride in just one month. Choose from five captivating partners.

name: Where Dreams Die
summary: Where Dreams Die is an upcoming FNaF fangame

name: Whispers in the Dark
summary: Whispers in the Dark is an online cooperative RPG horror game mixing exploration phases of haunted and management places. Improve your character, his knowledge of the paranormal, his skills and his tools thanks to a research system.

name: Who Let the Frog Out
summary: Who Let the Frog Out is an exciting arcade game where you take control of a brave frog and embark on an adventure filled with dangers and incredible opportunities.

name: Whimel Academy
summary: Whimel is a cozy academia time-management dating simulation game set in a magic school. Study magic, develop hobbies and fall in love in this wholesome and enchanting place.

name: Where Cats?
summary: Look for 100 cats. Delicately hand drawn scenes, lovely animal characters. Short process, which will not take up too much player time. No punishment, relaxed and happy. You can play with your family and friends on the same computer. It is suitable for all ages.

name: Where Christmas Elves?
summary: Search for 100 Christmas elves. A carefully hand-painted scene. Short process, relaxed and enjoyable. You can choose the selected color you like, making it convenient for players who are color blind or weak. You can achieve all your accomplishments without purchasing DLC.

name: What Games Does Your Dad Play
summary: What games does your dad play - It is a management game with the theme of running a game center, and players can replay a variety of stalls, electronic games, etc. from the 80s, 90s, and even 2000s.

name: Where are my potatoes 2: Land Of Mystery
summary: Kake potato character is coming back. Now Kake trashed in Land of Mystery where his mission is to collect different fruits and find again missing potatoes

name: Where the Music Dies
summary: A short visual novel about dealing with loss. You explore a festival filled with old memories and regret. Where the voices of the dead never stay quite dead. Will you manage to change, before it's too late?

name: Where the Music Dies: Mirror of Regret
summary: Two new supporting characters. Several strange new people to interact with. A new area, the dark twisted funfair, to explore.

name: Wholesome Adventure Bundle
summary: Nature is calling, follow its' song in the Wholesome Adventure Bundle, featuring Spirit of the North and No Place Like Home. Explore enchanting landscapes and then clean them!

name: Whispering Paws
summary: Embark on a poignant journey with Whispering Paws, a 3D adventure where you guide a determined fox to reunite its family. Explore enchanting landscapes, solve puzzles, and immerse yourself in a heartfelt narrative. Discover the magic within nature's embrace.

name: What's Outside
summary: You’re stuck out in the middle of space alone in ship, see how long you can survive with endless enemy ships and do all it again.

name: Whispers of Yashan

name: Where is Drake?

name: Who am I: Remedy
summary: Horror-detective game created on Unreal Engine 5. Solve puzzles, read notes, enjoy original soundtrack, don't forget to pick up the phone and finally, answer the question "Who am I?".

summary: A former friend needs you to rescue him from an abandoned research station on Mars. Explore the station, engage in interactive dialogues and solve mysteries. What will await you?

name: Whispering Lane

name: Wheelborn
summary: Take control of Arback in 'Wheelborn,' a gripping 3D indie beat 'em up adventure set in a world where the Wheelborn, car-like creatures with a unique lifecycle, face corruption. Engage in intense combat, explore, make narrative choices, and shape Arback's destiny.

name: Whacking Hell!
summary: The gates of hell have opened: whack all the monsters before they whack you! Collect their souls, ramp up your weapons and your spells, and become a slaughtering machine in this frantic roguelite top-down 2D shooter!

name: What's Up There?
summary: A simple journey but which requires enormous concentration. Will you be able to reach the Light above or will you stay forever below? Fake and true game endings for the most curious players.

summary: The body is free, with 100 jellyfish. DLC adds 450 jellyfish on top of the original 100. A total of 550 jellyfish. DLC does not include achievements. You only need to pass the ontology to achieve full success.

summary: Johnny still hasn't come home. But where is he ? Who is this Voltaire? Fight to discover the truth.

summary: Search for 100 Ferrets. A carefully hand drawn 4K scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Where's the Boat
summary: Where's the Boat is a sandbox open world survival game set on an archipelago of deserted islands. Gather resources, craft tools, tend to your needs and travel from island to island in search for a way back to civilization.

name: Where Does Art Goes When It Dies?
Wheel of Fortune
summary: This is a DS game based on the popular game show of the same name.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Space Conquest
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Space conquest

name: WhyTaoism
summary: Why Taoism Is an adventure game that explores spirituality and transcendence. In this game, players will take on the role of a group of beings who follow the legends of the ancient immortals and hope to ascend in order to transcend.

name: Who Made this Art? Human or AI
summary: Will you be able to distinguish between real art and that created by an artificial intelligence?

name: Whimzzle
summary:
Combine intermediate puzzle pieces into bigger pieces to reveal the completed image in this atypical jigsaw puzzle game!

Whether a leisure puzzler completing intermediate pieces one at a time, or a hardcore enthusiast taking on the entire puzzle box at once - Whimzzle offers an adaptable, unique and engaging jigsaw experience for all puzzlers.

name: Why do you love me?
summary: A short romantic novel about modern relationships. We took some situations from life and tried to answer the question "why do people love each other?".

name: Whiteout Frontier
summary: In this turn based, survival focused Tactical SRPG, you must defend locations from dynamic and intelligent enemy groups wishing to destroy the town for their own survival. Hang out and bond with your crew as you defend and save what you can as everything slips into chaos. Every choice matters.

name: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Complete Edition
summary: On the night of March 14th 2001, exactly one day after the incident at Yeondu High, four individuals return to the school in search of answers to the unsolved mysteries that haunt them. Uncover the hidden dark truth in this direct sequel to the Korean horror cult classic. Investigate bizarre phenomena, evade bloodthirsty killers, and unravel a twisting narrative across three unnerving episodes.

name: Why God?
summary: Climb high up the Tower of Babel by swinging and dodging all the children of the Lord to be able to ask GOD in one once and for all because he has made you so horrible in a world 2D cartoony. Explore in the most frenetic way the sad but exciting story of our little Amalgama.

name: Wheel of Fortune
summary: Raw Thrills’ newest arcade superstar Wheel of Fortune delivers the same glitz and glamor of the Mega Hit television game show. With a Hi Def 32inch LCD touchscreen, incredibly realistic graphics and a Larger than Life Wheel, this game is a winner with children and adults alike.

name: Where Is George
summary: George is a sneaky little cat that loves to hide. Can you find him? In this free to play game you need to find 100 cats in beautiful hand drawn levels. Are you able to find them all?

name: WhichWayOut?
summary: WhichWayOut? is a dark themed physics puzzle platformer.

name: White Cat Town Mystery
summary: White Cat Town Mystery is a visual novel/adventure game about an anthropomorphic cat named Lumi. Help him explore atmospheric and magical town, meet old friends again, make hard choices, and go through supernatural challenges. What you choose decides the fate of the town—and Lumi himself!

name: Whispers in the Void
summary: The main hero John Eikts wakes up in a mysterious room for supernatural creatures. Anomalies escape, wreaking havoc. Eikts must navigate the chaos while uncovering his dark past. As he approaches freedom, a shocking twist reveals that he is not a victim, but one of them.

name: Whisper Of The Curse
summary: "Whisper of the Curse" is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game where you and your team will perform various rituals and spells to eliminate the curse and fend off cursed entities. At the same time, you'll need to avoid being hunted by these malevolent entities.

name: Whirlight: No Time To Trip
summary: In the heart of Verice Bay, a brilliant idea takes shape in the hands of an eccentric inventor and an eclectic artist. Follow Margaret and Hector in a point-and-click graphic adventure that will take you to the edge of space and time to help them avert imminent danger.

name: Whispers of Prague: The Executioner's Last Cut
summary: Classic first-person point-and-click adventure game set in contemporary Prague. As a programmer and treasure hunter, you embark on a long journey to uncover the secrets of the infamous Executioner. Your task will be complicated by a sect of fanatic cultists and your own unexplained heritage.

name: Whack-a-Mole
summary: A "whack-a-mole" style game in which the player must use the fire and directional buttons to hit one of the four corresponding targets on the screen. The player loses if either he/she presses the wrong button, or taking too long to press. This game is variously known as "Hammer Attack", "Ghost Hunter" or "Alien Darts" in some packaging manuals. On the top of the screen, a symbol is used to represent the correct/wrong button press, usually "X" and "O", or in some version, a smile or frown.

name: Where The Crows Roam
summary: Where The Crows Roam is a survival horror game made by a 6th grader in his free time. In this game you will get to explore the now deserted Stunig City and its outer ruins. Watch your back because you never know what is watching you. Can you survive?

name: Who Do You Want to Date? Professional Girls Collection
summary: A confident policewoman, a tough military woman, a flirtatious tennis player, or a gentle artist? Or maybe someone else? Who do you want to date?

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: WWE DLC Pack
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: WWE

name: WhenTaken
summary: Look at the photo and try to guess the location and the year when it was taken. Place your pin on the map. Move the slider to select the year or simply type it in. When you’re ready, press the button to make your guess.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Hitchcock DLC Pack
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Hitchcock

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: NBA/NHL/MLB/NFL DLC Pack
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: NBA/NHL/MLB/NFL

name: WhiteTrick: Western
summary: Even outside the countryside, his scam continues! Win the breathtaking psychological battle between the police and White. WhiteTrick is a multiplayer turn-based board game that can be enjoyed by up to 4 people.

name: White Redemption
summary: An adventure game that can be played with a picture book feel, without text in the game.

name: Where Safety Ends R
summary: What does it take to be SAFE? Maybe it's all about a person who will come to your rescue no matter what. Or maybe it has to do with a place that you know inside and out. OR, perhaps, (just maybe) a room full of strangers with no entrance might just do the trick.

name: WhyImmortal
summary: What is Immortal is a multiplayer sandbox game with Chinese Immortal Cultivation culture. Players take on the role of a cultivator, exploring, cultivating, refining and other events, during which they will realize the true meaning of "seeking immortality", "the great way" and "longevity".

name: Who Murdered My Empress?
summary: “Who Murdered My Empress?” is a visually stunning romance visual novel set in a fantastical realm inspired by 19th century Vietnam. Assume the role of an Empress with a lavish harem of captivating men as you navigate intrigue, love, and mystery.

name: Wheelie Racer
summary: A racing game produced by Epoch for the Super Cassette Vision in 1985.

name: What's Wong With the Girls' Staircase
summary:
In a legally distinct school of witchcraft and wizardry, something is wrong with the girls' staircase. It’s enchanted to keep boys out, but now it seems to be keeping the girls out too. Or is it?

Join Thara Min, and her best friend Clara on this short cute story about identity and acceptance, and validation!

Submitted for the Trans Wizards are Wizards game bundle, all proceeds go to supporting LGBTQ creators.

name: Where are You?
summary: You're 7 years old, and you can't find your big sister. Search the house and collect the four parts of her diary, to find out where she is.

name: Who Wants to Be a Murderer?
summary: Who Wants to Be a Murderer? is a psychological horror game set in a TV game show straight out of the 90s. You'll face a series of challenges that will put your morality and sanity to the test.

name: What The Pak?!
summary: What The Pak?! is an online, multiplayer party game. Play as little, mischievous monsters called PAK and annoy your life-long friends as much as you can. We genuinely ask that you don’t hold back. Throw them overboard and steal their chickens. They’ll be like “WHAT THE P…”

name: What If Your Girl Was a Frog 2
summary: The girl looked longingly at the thick rain. She dreamed of the creatures she loved so much. Frogs are different, green and yellow, big and small, but one thing is for sure, they are so cute! The girl made up her mind and ran through the rain in the direction of her dream!

name: Whiz Kid
summary: Word spelling game

name: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire: The Smurfs DLC Pack
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: The Smurfs
