summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: US Movies 70s

name: Who's Next?
summary: 『Who's Next?』 is a real-time multiplayer social deduction game set in the traditional Korean hell, featuring a massacre of ghosts and spirits, with individual survival competition rather than team battles, focusing on 'Chasing Tail'.

name: Whiplash Taxi Co
summary:
A break-neck taxi driving game. Welcome to the Whiplash Taxi Company, where our motto is "The slower you're there, the lower the fare!"

As a valued employee and taxi driver, your job is to pick up passengers and deliver them to their destination as fast as possible, by any means necessary.

Passengers are easy to spot, just look for the big red arrows over their heads.

name: Which Country Is Larger?
summary: Is China bigger than the US?

name: Whale Captain
summary: Embark on your Dream Adventure: Discover uncharted lands, master the waves, and soar the skies! A challenging shoot-em-up bullet dodging game with a dash of side-scrolling platformer featuring a crew with hearts of gold at the ready, awaiting their Whale Captain.

name: What Lurks Inside
summary: Immerse in a 4-player game of deceit and survival where anyone could turn into a monstrous threat. Survivors must escape a dynamic facility, completing missions for a higher score, while the creature blends in, sabotaging their efforts. Trust is your biggest challenge

name: Where Dragon Spirits
summary: The Dragon Spirits series crossover search game will keep your eyes busy. Find all the hiding Dragon Spirits. Well hand-drawn 4K scenes filled with adorable dragons. Short gameplay that won't take up too much of the player's time. Very easy to grab all achievements.

name: Whispers in the Shadows
summary: A Horror game, where you use your torch to fend off the monsters created in your own head, and discover the secrets hidden within the forest.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Tintin Pack
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Tintin

name: White Path
summary: Addictive and difficult, combining precise jumping and mental endurance. Explore this universe with double jump, dash, dilemmes, choices, 3d and 2d. Each level is unique, for an unforgetable experience.

name: Whelm
summary: A mysterious island has fallen into disrepair and only you can save it. Rescue animals, replant seeds and repair machines. We're counting on you, young penguin.

name: Whispers of Silence
summary: Dive into the haunting narrative of "Whispers of silence" a first-person exploration game where every object tells a story and every note reveals a fragment of the past.

name: Whispers Of Sylvan Grove
summary: An adult pixel art open-world fantasy RPG that follows the journey of Willow, a 19-year-old fawn girl and the last of her kind, navigating a once-thriving forest now invaded by humans. Forge bonds and bring harmony back to a world on the brink of imbalance.

name: Who's the Boss
summary: The game features a variety of game modes, each with its own unique challenges and objectives.

name: What Awaits, Aleksey?
summary: Utilize your analytical skills to connect the dots and unveil hidden conspiracies! Join the ranks of the People's Intelligence Bureau as a junior cryptologist, decipher cryptic messages and unravel plots brewed up by enemies of the state. Or . . . decide to save them...?

name: White: Invasion
summary: WHITE is a first-person, open-world action-adventure game. As players explore the open world, they discover and repair the destroyed facilities, engage in fast and arcade-like combat with fantastical creatures, and delve into quests.

name: Who Wears The Crown?
summary: Test your brain and your brawn in the toughest chess game ever made! Play against a tough chess engine to build your path and climb upward to claim the crown, but be careful! One small blunder and you risk losing your progress. Heavy is the head that wears the crown, but who will wear it?

name: When The World Became Black
summary: You play as 07, who wakes up with strange powers in a post-apocalyptic future. Your choice changes the story! Do you become the lost hero? Or do you become something to fear?

name: What Happened to Kate
summary: "What happened to Kate" is a gripping puzzle adventure set in a mysteriously silent home. Unravel your coworker's disappearance through challenging puzzles. Delve into the depths of mystery and discover what lies within the quiet.

name: Who is the Joker?
summary: Who Is The Joker is a horror adventure online multiplayer game. As different identities, find various props and various key clues to find out who is the joker or human. Survive and become a champion. Rich and detailed game scenes and thrilling music effects render the exciting atmosphere. Come and play!

name: Where Have All the Globbletops Gone?
summary:
The Magnificent Merle, an intrepid entomologist, happens across a mysterious book that hints towards the existence of elusive, mythical creatures called Globbletops. Out of his element, yet desperately in need of grant money for his floundering foundation, he decides to brave the long journey to the Farwaythians Peaks to unravel the ancient mystery of the Globbletops.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 55 in April of 2024, whose theme was Summoning.

name: Who Axed You?
summary: Slay the weather wizards and their dragons because they bothered you as Vasile, an axe throwing drunk peasant! This game is based on the Romanian myth about solomonars and dragons.

name: Where's Tess
summary: Where's Tess is an offline adventure story in the visual novel genre in the style of anime and sim game about becoming the ultimate travel blogger and influencer.

name: Whispers
summary:
Guess the spy while networking at a retro game launch in 2124!

Whispers is a short interactive story about networking in the video games industry and the experiences of marginalized developers at work. Set in a retro horror game made in 2124, this is an early prototype featuring two characters and several endings.

name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego?
summary: Players take on the role of gumshoe and explore the globe tracking down crafty criminals through guided tours of various locales and beautifully painted 360-degree panoramas. The player must use their knowledge to find Carmen Sandiego or any of her innumerable henchmen, all with the help of a searchable database within the game that contains: video clips; essays on each area's economics, politics and culture; maps; and photographs.

name: Where Winter Crows Go
summary: Would you risk living together with a stranger in an isolated cabin to avoid the freezing cold?

name: When I Said "It's Ok To Be Cringe" I Didn't Mean Like That
summary: A freeform exploration game about walking around and talking to people and interacting with things and nothing interesting happening.

name: Where Are They?
summary: Where Are They? is a game of Where's Waldo? Are you able to find all the hidden things?

name: What the Fog
summary: What the Fog?! You’ve been sucked into a cursed boardgame! Now you and a friend will need to work together to survive. Run, jump, dash, and shoot to escape swarms of angry monsters in this chaotic co-op roguelite from the world of Dead by Daylight.

name: Whispers of The Abyss
summary: Whispers of The Abyss is a horror game set on an old, abandoned oil rig owned by a ruthless corporation, Mangrove Dynamics. Your task is to survive. Just survive. And remember one thing: machines and fluid are your best allies.

name: White Island
summary: Welcome to Kvitøya Research Station. It's going to be chilly, so make sure to bring some extra socks! You have been invited to share your project as part of their research scholarship program. Everything is going to be perfect, until you get there and it's not.

name: When Pigs Can Fly: Enter The Aporkalypse
summary: In this apocalyptic SHMUP game, pigs are taking over the earth thanks to a zombie virus plaguing the worlds pig population. You are the hero of humanity and with the use of your biomechanical suit you can turn anything into a weapon.

name: Where the Anemones Bloom
summary: Cordelia leads a life that most mermaids would envy. She has close friends and is part of a prominent pod, her future is all planned out. But Cordelia isn’t most mermaids. When her pod moves to the coast, she’s warned about the forbidden shallows and the dangers that lurk beyond. She’s heard all the rumours of course, but none of her friends will go near it. Curiosity gets the better of Cordelia, and she soon finds herself trembling at the fearful lights and hum of this strange city. However, something - someone actually - has also caught her eye. What starts as mere curiosity blossoms into something far more interesting. Soon Cordelia questions who she really is, and what she really wants. As she ventures further into uncharted territory, she gets closer to love but further from who she is and what she knows. Will she risk it all for a taste of the forbidden?

name: Where Is My Cat
summary: "Where is My Cat" is a horror shooter game where you play as a janitor in an abandoned medical school and spend your days looking for your missing cat.

name: Where is Love?
summary: "Where is Love?" is a dark, choice-driven comedy that questions love and family, with a painful sting in your nostrils and the acrid aftertaste of vodka.

name: Who Shot James R. Burnside?
summary: Use your deductive skills to solve the mystery of who shot James R.Burnside!

name: What's on Agenda
summary: A short, chill social clicker where you shape the narrative of the newly formed SARO Federation. Follow Jan Eteri, a prominent lawyer, and see how propaganda changes society's perception.

name: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire: US Presidents DLC Pack
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: US Presidents

name: Whispers of the Eyeless
summary: Guide your Cult. Oversee your Sanctum. Stay in the Shadows. Serve the Dead Gods.

name: Whisker President
summary: Whisker President is a comedic, casual point-and-click game set in a cartoon style oval office. Armed with only a laser pointer and some glue, help the purresident achieve political success by making him stamp the bills, all while ensuring that distractions don't get in the way.

name: Where Are We?
summary: Trapped in an unknown space for unknown reasons, the two adventurers must now turn their teamwork for finding treasure into one for survival and escape! Will adventurers escape from the unknown space and get treasure again?

name: WhiteWater 3D
summary: Fun, fast paced down river whitewater kayaking game. Race against friends or go solo and unlock new kayaks and discover new unique items for your character. Fun trick / stunt mechanics and real water physics simulation make this river runner a frantic fantastic game to play with friends and family.

name: Whistling Waters
summary: Catch as many fish on as possible to meet your boss' quota and avoid damaging your steamboat.

name: Whimsical Wizardry
summary:
Whimsical Wizardry is multiplayer party game about casting spells at your friends. Turn eight maps and four game modes into a chaotic battlefield as you scramble for victory! Who will be the best worst wizard of them all?

Cast 20 unique spells at your friends and enemies, each with their own wacky effects! Customize your wizard before heading into battle.

Whimsical Wizardry is developed by Silver Standard Studios, an independent game studio based out of Ottawa, Ontario.

name: Who Is The Killer: Episode IV
summary: You have recently received an unexpected invitation. Frederick Adams, a psychiatrist whom you met several years ago, has invited you to observe a remarkable case of mental illness. Late at night, you arrived at the hospital near which your old friend lived. But in the morning, that particular female patient was found dead...

name: Whisper Forest
summary: Whisper Forest is a Japanese-style horror game where "Nesting creatures." lurks. Players collect Amulets and offer them to lanterns.

name: What is My Name
summary: A strange, unfamiliar environment greets you: Towering walls, fathomless pits, ledges and ropes connecting rooms in the strangest of ways. There must be something around here to serve as a clue.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?: Trivia Bundle
summary: The Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Trivia Bundle gives you access to brand new Content Packs, featuring over 2,000 new questions on a variety of interesting topics.!

name: Who is God
summary: An endless vertical autojumping game in which players choose one of four gods to compete for high scores

name: Where wh..?
summary: "Where wh..?" ("何处") is a point and click puzzle game based on Lowpoly art style, you need to find the different and hidden resources in the screen, travel through nine worlds, explore the unknown areas, various gameplay, melodious music, suitable for all people to get started easily.

name: Whiskers Wonderland

name: Where Are the Creatures of Mountains and Seas
summary: The mythical creatures in the Classic of Mountains and Seas have all escaped. You need to analyze over a thousand characters in 12 Chinese cities, recall over a hundred mythical creatures and races, please embark on an exciting journey.

name: Who Am You?
summary: Who am “you”? Who am “you’”? depends on only the selection of “me”. There would be 7 days to find who you are. You may or may not notice the "I" at first during that time.

name: Whack 'Em Smack 'Em Byrons
summary: They're wacky! They're smacky! They're smart-alecky! They're Byrons, and they're popping up all over! Bop these troublesome little bears with a swing of your patented PEEK-0 hammer, but don't whack their butts... and definitely don't hit their cartoon bombs.
