name: What the Bat?: Batty Goes to Battywood
Wherever You Hike
summary:
Wherever You Hike is our first Smol Dreamers project, a bite sized game made in 10 weeks taking you on a little hike and canoe exploration.

There is no goal, no timer, no pressure. We just want you to take a break from the noise of life.
Explore the lake, its forests and their smol secrets, find a good place to camp and enjoy the vibes.

name: What The Floosh Game
summary: Get ready for an exciting adventure in "What The Floosh Game", a dynamic, action-packed game that will challenge your skills and reflexes! Navigate through a universe full of obstacles, collect precious coins, and challenge yourself in different difficulty levels. With vibrant graphics, intuitive controls, and an immersive soundtrack, each match will be a unique and electrifying experience.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Hot Seat
summary: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Hot Seat is a mobile game based on the Australian version of Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? for iOS. The game features a single player mode and 3 multiplayer modes, including online play and local play.
developers: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited
publishers: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited

name: WhereHurt
summary: Immerse yourself in WhereHurt, a psycho-horror game where reality and nightmare collide. Navigate your home, city, and workplace, racing against time to escape inner demons and societal mental barriers. Can you solve the puzzles and confront your fears, or will you be lost forever?

name: Which Kanji? So Fancy!
summary:
Where is the flower labeled “仙人掌” in the illustration?
Let’s learn KANJI, even difficult ones for Japanese people, in a fun way through this game!

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Junior
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: 2nd Edition
What Beats Rock
summary: Rock, paper, scissors...but it keeps going? Simple to play, difficult to master, enter the longest chain of increasingly powerful entries that you can!

name: Whiskers in the Dark
summary:
Lurk through the underground tunnels as you stealthily make your way through them in Whiskers in the Dark.

Play as a small cat confined to the space of the shadows, hiding away from the lights (and whatever's out there) seeking to hunt you down. Carefully make your way back to the other cats who've already made their escape, but be careful not to get caught!

name: What Must Be Done
summary: Knowing what must be done, you venture into the dungeon to start collecting the resources necessary. Who knows where this path will lead...

name: Whiskerwood
summary: Establish a home for your industrious mice under the oppressive paw of your cat overlords in this city builder featuring complex simulations, intricate production chains, and the age-old rivalry between cat and mouse.

name: Whisper of the Swallows
summary: Sink into a vast, strange and unforgiving world, in procedural generation. Fight against extreme climatic conditions. Alone or in cooperation, survive, explore, build and bring light back to the chaos.

name: When The King Speaks
summary: Recruit over 65 characters in this turn-based RPG! A living world in which you decide the time of events!

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
summary: A mobile game based on the TV series Who Wants to Be a Millionaire developed for iOS devices.
developers: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited
publishers: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
summary: A game based on the TV series Who Wants to Be a Millionaire made for Mac and Apple TV.
developers: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited
publishers: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited

name: Why Did The Chicken Cross The Road?
summary: A pixel-art shooter roguelike with almost infinity of options to upgrade your weapons. Will you be able to fly the coop and find the answers that your people have been searching for years?

name: Whispering Age
summary: Whispering Age is a strategy where you command your army through written orders. Manage resources, build your empire, and defend your base against waves of enemies. Adapt to the unique dynamic of indirect control and lead your kingdom to glory!

name: Whiskers
summary: This game places you against a pristine white backdrop

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire 2010
summary: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire 2010 was a mobile game based on the Who Wants To Be A Millionaire by Capcom originally released in 2009.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: 2nd Edition
summary: A J2ME port of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: 2nd Edition.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Music Edition
summary: A musical themed version of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire for mobile.

name: When You See It
summary: Search for 5 creatures across real photos in this hidden object horror game. Look closely at each image. If you see the creature, press spacebar before the camera changes. But be careful, if your face is too close to the screen, the jumpscares will be worse.

name: What's the Point?
summary: Experience the ultimate existential crisis simulator! Our FPS-loving indie studio took an unexpected detour into philosophy. Push a metaphorical boulder, question life's purpose, and maybe find meaning (or just sore muscles). It's Sisyphus meets game dev madness in our debut title.

name: White Cat Adventure Team
summary: You will play the role of the White Cat Adventure Team, embarking on adventures on this fantasy continent and experiencing the story. Search and collect various skills and items to face various battles.

name: Whispers of The Shadow
summary: Detective Grace Lawson sets out immediately upon receiving a tip about her missing stepsister Amy, and when she gets there, she suddenly finds herself trapped inside the house. Now, Grace has only one goal: to find her missing sister and escape this nightmare.

name: Whispering Death
summary: Whispering Death is a short horror experience that puts you in a mysterious realm blending in with your past. Solve puzzles and find out who you are. But remember you are always beeing watched, so think through every decission you make before it's too late.

name: While Mom is Away
summary: While Mom's Away is a fast-paced First-Person Shooter where you kill players with toasters, pizza and satellite dishes... And also shoot with chips? What kind of goofy game is this?!

name: While Sleeping
summary: A first-person horror game dealing with sleep paralysis. You are lying in bed, unable to move, experiencing creepy phenomena and having to survive until morning from ghosts.

name: Who is the Defendant: Deliberately Rough
summary: "Who is the Defendant" is a mystery genre visual novel. Players take on the role of a prosecutor, investigating a case involving "a game with rudimentary art published on STEAM."

name: Whisper of the House
summary: What's happening in this seemingly peaceful town? Strange residents, bizarre incidents, and unexpected storylines! Please be sure to let go of all your human lifestyle preferences and strive to meet the special requests of your otherworldly employers. Decorate this house with peculiar furniture!

name: Why Don't They Laugh?
summary: A first-person narrative horror game where you will get dangerously close to the secrets of the Kensington circus dynasty and discover what lies behind their famous shows' scenes.

name: While (true)
summary:
Ina is a young woman that refuses to leave her room. She instead escapes into a dream world of endless possibilities. Play as Ina, and discover the possibilities of infinite dreaming.

Created for the 2024 Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
summary: An in-flight entertainment video game adaptation based on the popular TV series Who Wants To Be A Millionaire.

name: Whale Well
summary: Whale Well is a short adventure game where you play as a duck. Collect and trade items while exploring a civilization in the belly of a great whale.

name: Where in the U.S.A. Is Carmen Sandiego?
summary: The remake version of Where in the U.S.A. Is Carmen Sandiego? was released in 1996 by Windows and Macintosh and features Lynne Thigpen playing "The Chief" from the World game show. The game's opening credits finds Carmen Sandiego arriving in her underground V.I.L.E. outpost in Washington, D.C., as she and RoboCrook plan to steal America's greatest treasure from each of the 50 states. Carmen later contacts each of her 39 V.I.L.E. operatives telling them to begin their missions.

name: Whatever We Decide to Call this Game
summary: Whatever We Decide to Call this Game is a text adventure game in which one finds themselves outside the doors of their new college with three tasks to accomplish - find a bathroom, enroll in classes, and get a parking sticker.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2013
summary: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2013 is a 2013 Java mobile game based on the Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? series.

name: White Knight Chronicles II
summary: White Knight Chronicles II, the sequel to White Knight Chronicles: International Edition, is an epic role-playing game available exclusively on the PlayStation 3 computer entertainment system. The game masterfully blends the cinematic storytelling of a single player role-playing game (RPG) with an entertaining and interactive co-op multiplayer RPG experience. From famed Japanese developer LEVEL-5, White Knight Chronicles II, features stunning graphics, over 400 new weapons and armors, and new skills and spells that make battles more interactive, strategic, and fast-paced. In addition to the full sequel, the game also includes the remastered White Knight Chronicles: International Edition as a bonus, delivering two full games and over 100 hours of combined gameplay.

name: Whispering Dream
summary: Aisly is a little boy who was having his sweet dream after a long time. Different from the usual, he was engaged in quite a realistic dream. As he goes, someone was trying to wake him up from his sleep...?

name: What Happened: Through Worlds
summary: Delve into a digital odyssey of discovery and unravel the mystery!

name: White Eternal
summary: There's something hiding in the cold of winter. What made your friend disappear? Snow's begun to fall. Let's just wait a little bit longer.

name: Who is the Criminal
summary: Set in school life, “Who is the Criminal” is a text-based adventure game featuring comedian and inference elements. With inquiring suspects and debating with “evildoers”, he gathers pieces of puzzles and reveals what truly happens in every incident.

name: Where there once was sand
summary:
In the middle of an endless desert, an old professor is giving his last efforts trying to discover what he've sought his whole life: the lost civilization of Mu. A life spent in the hunt of a myth, yet without any conclusive finding to support his theory that the continent is now buried under the sand.

His funding has been cut and the camp site is now to be turned into a mining complex. As a sentient machine sent to prospect the surroundings for geological opportunities, will you try to empathize with him, will try to help him unveil what may lie beneath the sand, or will you just limit yourself to what you've been sent for?

You may well be the help Dr. Willis had been expecting all this time...

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 3rd Edition - Family Picture Edition
summary: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 3rd Edition - Family Picture Edition is a British DVD game released by Universal Pictures UK which is based on the British version of the game show Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?.

name: What's done is Done
summary: A narrative-driven puzzle game about souls and forgetting. On the brink of reincarnation, she loses all her memories, and her soul is scattered. The memories of lingering spirits on the bridge seem to be connected to her story...

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010
summary: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010 is a Java mobile game based on the Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? series.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010: Part 2
summary: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010: Part 2 is a Java mobile installment of the TV series of the same name, and also the second part to Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2011
summary: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2011 is the 2011 installment of J2ME games based on the Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? TV series.

name: Whispered Secrets: Everburning Candle - Collector's Edition
summary: A fire at the local asylum takes on a supernatural life of its own! You’re called in to investigate and find dark and shady dealings behind the scenes, with the lives of several patients at stake. Who are these so-called ‘outcasts,’ and why are they really here? Douse the flames on this mystery as you explore hidden-object puzzles and solve mini-games!

name: When Pigs Fly
summary: Bounce from cloud to cloud and catch food along the way. Catch five apples to win!

name: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire: Microsoft Games DLC Pack
summary: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Microsoft Games

name: Who's There
summary: This game is a short retro horror experience. Features include a realistic environment, 3D sounds, object interaction, and a VHS film effect.

name: Where is Mrs Peregrine?
summary: A precious family member is missing! She's old, and the weather is pretty cold... Let's search for her!

name: Who Dies First?
summary: You will be put into silly and funny situations in real life where you have to predict who will die first. Try to predict as many correct as possible to get the highest IQ score. Compete with other players in intelligence.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?: Deluxe Upgrade
summary: The Deluxe Upgrade offers you more than 3,000 additional questions, on top of the 6,000+ questions in the basic game!

name: What Remains
summary: A non-linear, eerie visual novel inspired by Ukrainian folklore. Go caroling with Goat, Bear, and Granny to make choices that decide the villagers' fate, save dozens, or lead to disasters. Learn how powerful words and silence can be.

name: Whimside
summary: A creature collection game that sits at the bottom of your screen & fits easily into your routine. Whether you're working, studying, or relaxing, Whimside is always ready to offer you cozy pauses. Capture rare creatures, create new species & decorate your whimsical space in this soothing adventure.

name: WhatRogue: Exile Land
summary: "WhatRogue：Exile Land" blends roguelike, card construction, and tactical turn-based gameplay. The tactical element requires spatial strategies, enhancing strategic depth. Choose different heroes and companions to defeat various monsters and bosses.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Flash Edition
summary: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Flash Edition is a fanmade Flash game based on the game show Who Wants to Be a Millionaire created by Newgrounds user Frenzy.

name: White Heaven
summary: Canceled sequel to the 2012 Adventure-Horror game 'Anna.' White Heaven was to take place in an abandoned hotel nestled in the Italian Alps, eponymously titled White Heaven. Its narrative focuses on a kidnapped victim escaping his captivity after having fallen in love with one of his captors. The game was to follow three playable characters while continuing to explore the backstory of its predecessor rather than serving as a direct continuation. Early footage showcased chase sequences, which weren't attempted in the developer's previous work. The game was announced in 2013 and was being created in Unreal Engine 4 with an additional extension to aid with dynamic lighting. In 2020, its developers announced a cancelation of this iteration of the game, as they felt it to be "too much, too soon" in terms of the story they were attempting to tell.

name: Whites This
summary: A 4D maze game, that can help exercise those 4D brain cells.

name: Who is Paul
summary: Isaac, a failed detective, receives a mysterious letter that leads him to investigate a desolate and abandoned house in order to make ends meet. However, upon arrival, he realizes that instead of investigating, he must survive. To escape this house filled with dark secrets,

name: White Knuckle
summary: White Knuckle is a first person speed climbing game. Ascend through the guts of SUB-STRUCTURE 17 using precision movement mechanics. Sharp reflexes and resource management will take you to the highest peaks under ten thousand meters of concrete and decay.

name: Wheel of Fortune Daily
summary:
Play America’s #1 Word Puzzle Game — Now Reimagined as the Ultimate Daily Brain Game!

For nearly 50 years, Wheel of Fortune has challenged players to solve word puzzles and win big. Now, Wheel of Fortune Daily transforms America’s Game into an addictive daily word puzzle experience you can enjoy anytime, anywhere.

name: While We Sleep: Slendrina Is Here
summary: While We Sleep: Slendrina Is Here is the first person horror game in which you must find keys and fight evil beings. While most of are sleeping there are others fighting to keep us all safe. Slendrina is coming and you need to defeat the evil spirit for the safety of the world.

name: When Trees Turn to Ice
summary: This game was created for the Winter VN Jam 2022. It's a spinoff to Lovewood, but you don't need pre-knowledge to understand and enjoy the story of When Trees Turn to Ice.

name: Whole Note
summary: A casual card game where you use note cards and various items to combine cards and create Whole Note Cards.

name: Where is the Tutorial
summary: Where is the Tutorial is a game where the biggest challenge is simply figuring out how to play. Dropped into a whimsical world with no instructions, no hints, and no mercy, you're left to navigate a series of increasingly bizarre levels using only your wits and a growing sense of frustration.

name: Whispering Hills
summary: Whispering Hills is a Mod for Fallout 4 that aims to reproduce the look and feel of Silent Hill inside the Game of Fallout 4. It is made by Team Whisper and is to be considered a Fanmade free mod.

name: WhereTaken
summary: Place a pin on the map to guess where in the world a photo was taken. Players have 5 rounds of distinct locations, earning up to 200 points per round depending on how close their guess is to the photo depicted.

name: What is this Thing?
summary: What is this Thing? is a highly unconventional, episodic platform game made by DJ Yoshiman.

name: What Girls Do in the Dark
summary: This little game is based off one of the greatest fears I had as a teenage girl: showing up late to a stranger's slumber party. The rest of it is just extra. A short, text-based horror game.

name: Whole
summary: w(H)ole - An interpretation of “Mel’s Hole”. Modern folk myth by Death Orgone. Made for the HPS1 Halloween Jam 2020

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Complete Edition
Whiskara
summary: Whiskara is an action role-playing game where you play as a cat named Lyra. Whiskara also features choice-driven storytelling

name: What's the Dog Doing?
summary: The dog's been acting strange lately...

name: What's a King to a God
summary: You are a begrudging hero who has just overthrown God and must assume the role yourself. Manipulate heroes, monsters, and locations across the map to keep the realm at peace while building enough resources to stop the cycle of Chaos once and for all.

name: What Is in the Black Box?
summary: Prepare to embark on a journey of reflection, where you’ll seek answers to profound questions and uncover the ultimate truth: What truly lies within the black box?

name: Wheelchair Simulator
summary: Wheelchair Life Sim where mastering control and speed is key to overcoming outrageous obstacles! Even the simplest movements can be your greatest challenge.

name: Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego? 3: New Carmen Adventure
summary: In ACME's New York branch, the Chief informs agent Julia that some of the world's greatest treasures have been stolen. The Chief suspects the thefts to be the work of Carmen Sandiego, but there is lack of evidence to confirm it. Julia along with Adam Shadow are sent to find the thief and recover the treasures, before news of the theft reaches the public. Matt Forrest provides technical assistance during the mission. After many investigations around the world and putting together a digital map of Atlantis, it turns out that Carmen Sandiego had been intercepting ACME communications and planned this entire mission. Carmen Sandiego steals the map and heads to South America.

name: White Room: Mind’s Prison
summary: White Room: Mind's Prison is a psychological horror game. You're not allowed to make any sound. Entities will make you scream. Stay quiet! The day counter will increase as you survive! Survive as long as possible.

name: What If...? An Immersive Story
summary: You have been chosen! Step inside the limitless possibilities of Marvel Studios’ What If…? universe in this immersive Disney+ Original story exclusively on Apple Vision Pro, where you’ll be transported to different worlds. Come face-to-face with variants of your favorite characters and learn to harness the power of the Infinity Stones. But, …everything may not be all that it seems.

name: Whack Your Neighbor
summary: Whack Your Neighbor is a game in the "Whack Your" series and the first by WhackIt. In this one, you have to find 32 ways (27 ways in old version) to kill your neighbor. This game introduces combo kills, which would become a staple in WhackIt's next "Whack Your" games after this.

name: Whispers in the Wood
summary: Whispers in the Forest is a single-player base defense strategy game where you must build, upgrade, and defend your base against demonic creatures in a cursed forest. Manage your resources, lead your troops, and survive the darkness of the night as you fight to protect your only hope for salvation.

name: Whack Mole
summary: The player gets ready to face moles popping up from various holes. As the game advances, the speed and frequency of the moles' appearances increase, challenging the player's reflexes and hand-eye coordination.

name: Who am I?
summary: A man named Mark, who struggles to make ends meet, receives a letter informing him that his aunt has passed away. Despite their troubled past, Mark decides to investigate what happened, hoping to uncover the truth and perhaps find a chance for a better life.

name: What Is This Sorcery
summary: WITS (What Is This Sorcery) is an immersive digital trading card game (TCG) that brings together the classic appeal of card collecting with the dynamic interactivity of online gaming. Set against a backdrop of enchantment and strategy, WITS challenges players to master the art of magical combat, using a diverse array of cards that represent mythical creatures, arcane spells, and cunning tactics.

name: Who Wants to Win a Banana Hoard?
Who Is Who
summary: This community project featuring 8 maps was created to get everyone to try out the role of another mapper. The aim was to create a map in the style of a random mapper among other project members.

name: Whisperstring
summary: Whisperstring is an 80s inspired text adventure game that takes place inside a “chat room”. You’re connected to Adam, a "jock" with a severe fear of strings, who seems to have been the victim of a supernatural kidnapping. Will you be able to help him escape?

name: When Heaven Knocks
summary:
One year prior, the town of [REDACTED] suffered from an odd incident, where students from the local school were compelled to dance... Evidently, against their own will. Only one student was unaffected by this mass hysteria.

Now a year after the incident, a mysterious man visits an old abandoned church...

name: White Chocolate
summary: Consume WHITE CHOCOLATE to escape this pitch black facility. share it with that vile creature that survived alongside you. or don't, be an nuisance, it's always profitable to be an nuisance.

name: When Tails Gets Bored: Special Edition
Whale Flesh
summary: A short horror game where you dig through the flesh of a giant whale to find out what happened to your team.

name: Whispers of the Dead
summary: A psychological horror game that blurs the lines between love, fear, and reality. The story begins with Eve Levine, a college student caught in a nightmare after being abducted on a rainy evening in the shadowy St. Peters Park. Her fiancé, Adam Hale, a poet haunted by his own creations, must confront the darkness that emerges from his mysterious writings.

name: Wheelie 4: Time Travel
summary:
Wheelie is now back in his fourth edition and this time his adventures are trough time and space!
Wheelie broke his wheel and decided to visit his friend at car service, but something went wrong.
Can you help our favourite red beetle to visit the car fixing service?

name: Wheelie 1
summary:
Wheelie is now back in his First edition and this time his adventures are funner than ever!
Wheelie broke his wheel and decided to visit his friend at car service, but something went wrong.
Can you help our favourite red beetle to visit the car fixing service?

name: Wheel of Words: Crossword
summary: "Wheel of Words: Crossword" is a delightful word puzzle game designed to test your vocabulary and problem-solving skills. Connect letters to form words that fit into crossword puzzles, uncover hidden bonus words, and enjoy the rewarding feeling of completing each grid.

name: Where the Walls Breathe
summary: Where the Walls Breathe is a first-person psychological horror experience with a strong focus on atmosphere and environmental storytelling.

name: What Comes Next
summary: Stealth past enemies, solve puzzles and explore a unique narrative in this two-perspective cozy adventure game! You play as the orphaned girl Sophie and her pet rat Ami as you go on an adventure to find Sophies missing parents.

name: What's On The Menu?
summary: In What's on the Menu?, step into the shoes of a restaurant manager. From selecting ingredients and crafting menus to hiring staff and customizing your restaurant, every decision counts. Face random events, unlock new recipes, and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate restaurateur!

name: Where Am I?: GeoGuess Game
summary: Step into the shoes of a virtual traveler! Watch street walk videos and put your geography skills to the test. Can you guess the location? Discover new places today!

name: Where Noble Plans Lie
summary: Build-up your territory, your team of advisors, and your reputation as you bring every other noble to ruin at the behest of the Vampire Queen. Make the kingdom yours in the city-builder and turn-based RPG: Where Noble Plans Lie!

name: Where Are You, Diamond
summary: Where Are You, Diamond?

name: Whispering Memories
summary: Immerse yourself in a psychological thriller where your choices shape the story. Unravel the mysteries of a town plagued by supernatural phenomena, as you navigate the environments and interact with complex characters. Can you uncover the truth before it consumes you?

name: Whale Singer: Rise of the Leviathan
summary: Dive into a musical adventure where singing is the key to defeating an ominous creature destroying the oceans. Follow the song of your ancestors, explore breathtaking environments, forge new connections, and discover the magic in the depths of the sea... and the magic within.

name: Why?
summary: A bizarre and oddly captivating journey of patience, self-reflection, destruction, and meditation. Embrace the challenge, endure bare-knuckle blows, and seek the mystical light in this ethereal clicker game.

name: What Happened on the Moon?
summary: What happened on the Moon? is a short horror game where you control an AI Moon Rover on a mission to investigate mysterious activity on the lunar surface...

name: Who's Who 2.0
summary:
Who's Who 2.0 is causal, party battle royale genre game which have elevated the fun of the battle to another level.

You will have to find real players lurking among the NPCs and kick them out of the game with your new skills! find your own psychological and strategical way to be the last man standing!

name: Where in Time is Carmen Sandiego?
Who Is Ethan?
summary: You wake up in an abandoned hospital, with no memory of who you are. The silence is heavy. Shadows move. Something—or someone—might be watching you. Trapped between reality and nightmare, the only way out is to piece together the truth hidden in your surroundings.

name: Whoopi
summary: Whoopi is a fun clicker game where you interact with a cute monster. Click to feed or attack Whoopi, collect coins, and open cases to get unique skins. Watch as Whoopi grows to a galaxy or shrinks to a molecule. Sell rare skins on the marketplace and earn real money!

name: Who Made This
summary: Who Made This is a fun, light and easy-to-play click and point investigation game. Put your detective skills to the test by walking around the city and visiting various places, collecting the information you need to solve the cases.

name: Whispers of Fear
summary: You step into the shoes of a woman being stalked by a mysterious figure. What was supposed to be a safe haven in an isolated forest house turns into a nightmare as strange events unfold during the night. Each night grows more terrifying... Can you escape before it’s too late?

name: Whiskey-Four
summary:
Never stop running, not with the galaxy at stake. Save it at all costs, and save yourself if you can.

The corpos are after you. The cops are, too. Even your ex has crawled out of the grave to try and get you back. Meanwhile, the fate of the galaxy itself rests on a knife's edge, and only you can bar the doors of hell.

Whiskey-Four is a standalone 396,000-word interactive novel by John Louis. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

You are a retired contract killer from the Anomalous Interference Unit. Injured on the line of duty, you were forced into an early retirement--only to be reactivated on a distant frontier world to address a horrific, unknowable threat.

A great sense of malaise permeates the void. Something big is stirring, something that jeopardizes the entire galaxy.

You're the only person in position to stop it before it's all too late.

Too bad everyone else wants you dead.

name: Where's My Kitty
summary: Do you like playing hide and seek with cats? Come and find them.

name: Wheel Of Fates
summary: A lovingly crafted RPG with a unique spin, with cheerful characters and fun storytelling.

name: Wheelie King 7
summary: Realistic 3D motorbike simulator All devices cross-play (IOS,Steam,Android). Steam-deck compatible. Realistic motorbike wheelie game. Customize bikes. Play offline & online. Change bike parts. Spray paint bike parts. Play offline & online Change bike parts Spray paint bike parts.

name: Wheelie City
summary: Wheelie City is a game about doing deliveries as fast as possible, climbing the urban ranks while collecting and customizing your bike to fit your style! Stunt your way accross hand crafted maps to find shortcuts and secrets and become the best delivery driver in the Wheelie City

name: What the Chuck?
summary: Jump, Dodge and Chuck your way through a variety of battlefields in this local platforming multiplayer game. Play with two to four players in a chaotic and cartoony free-for-all. Prove yourself as the ultimate woodchuck warrior and crush your friends' dream of achieving gold!

name: Whispered Secrets: Cruise of Misfortune - Collector's Edition
summary: How deep do the dark waters go?

name: What's Needed
summary: This is a casual 3rd person shooter game that includes shooter combat mechanics for the playable humanoid, mech and tank. Explore the open world, chat with the quirky inhabitants, and shoot down the monstrous creatures and dangerous rogue robots wandering around the island.

name: What the Clash?
summary: Battle your friends in goofy online 1v1 mini matches! Play over 300 silly mini games through endless absurd (and very stupid) card combos!

name: Wheelsprung
summary: In Wheelsprung, you’ll flip, weave, and launch through obstacle-filled courses in a whimsical, hand-drawn world. Bounce off seesaws, soar between bookshelves, and discover hidden surprises. Nail the perfect run, beat your best time, and climb the leaderboards to prove you're the fastest squirrel on two wheels.

name: Where Are We?
summary: In the depths of the unknown, you stumble upon what is both foreign and yet unsettlingly familiar...

name: Where in Hell is Carmen Santiago?
Wheel Up the Hill
summary: Roll a wheel uphill in this chill physics-based challenge. Soothing music meets soul-crushing difficulty. Easy controls, hard to master. Get to the top, if you can.

name: When the Crow Sings
summary: WHEN THE CROW SINGS is an adventure mystery game with a focus on exploration, characters, and world building, featuring a cast of diverse survivors trying to keep the status quo as their compound life grows more complicated and dangerous.

name: What Walks on Four Legs
summary: Play as Charles, an old journalist chasing down rumours of a strange phenomenon known as Portals that change anything that passes through them. An other-wordly mysterious light emits from the Lighthouse nearby. He had to see this for himself.

name: Where's my Bara Deck?
summary: Your Bara cards have vanished! Someone hid your deck around the house, and only you can find it. Explore 3D environments, search every corner, and unlock sensual art as you complete your collection. Ready for this spicy, surprise-filled hunt?

name: Where They Wait
summary: "Never enter the forest on Beltane Eve," they said

name: Where's That Person?
summary: Find the Right Person Before Time Runs Out! A Fun and Cute Brain-Training Search Game

name: Why Jump
summary: Why Jump? Because the only way is up. Why Jump is a vertical platformer where one wrong move can cost you — but don't worry, there are checkpoints to catch your breath. Sometimes. Test your patience, sharpen your skills, and see how high you can climb.

name: What Lies Frozen
summary: A Psychological Horror game. Featuring puzzles, immersive environment, a tense atmosphere, and a unique hand-drawn art style.

name: What Happened to Lily?
summary: What Happened to Lily? is a Real-Time First Person Horror Game. We Investigate The Mystery Behind The Tragic Event That Happened in a Farmhouse 2 Months Ago.

name: What is That Outside
summary: A short web game about curiosity made by droqen.

name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego?
White Room Protocol
summary: A psychological first-person horror game where you enter a memory-erasing protocol and relive a trauma. Uncover dark secrets, and experience fear through immersive atmosphere.

name: Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Soar into "Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles"! Piece together stunning scenes of hawks, owls, and songbirds in vibrant habitats. Unlock bird facts and enjoy customizable puzzles. A delightful avian escape!

name: What Could Go Wrong?
summary: A one-staff shoestring budget bio-lab management simulation game

name: Whiskers and Wizardry
summary: Step into the magical paws of an overconfident wizard cat in this action-packed roguelite! Craft unique spells, battle hordes of minions and powerful bosses, cleanse the forest of evil, and rescue your Human Wizard Owner. From the creators of Margoq's Lair, a studio focused on roguelite games.

name: Why Not Both?
summary:
Why Not Both? is a cozy yuri romance kinetic visual novel. Set in a solarpunk future, this story follows Rio, Jen, and Aspen as they navigate love, identity, and connection.

WNB features anime-style characters, painted backgrounds, a chillhop soundtrack, positive polyamorous representation, and a hopeful solarpunk setting.

name: Where Is My Hat?
summary: Help the forgetful deity find its hat among its sacred relics! Push, kick, search for artifacts, and flee from the god’s whims. In this absurd chaos, the one who best controls their emotions wins. Test yourself and your friend!

name: Whisper
summary: Whisper is a chilling first-person horror game set in a haunted mansion filled with dark secrets and eerie whispers. As an investigator, explore the shadowy corridors, solve haunting puzzles, and uncover the tragic past of Whisper Manor. Will you survive the terror within?

name: White Cat Stories
summary: "White Cat Stories" is a 2D platformer game. In this game, players take on the role of brave knight on a journey that is both dangerous and magical. Our protagonist is a fallen knight, in order to find her purpose in life, she embarks on a journey.

name: Whispers of the Past
summary: Whispers of the Past" is an immersive first-person adventure that combines time manipulation, psychological exploration, and puzzle-solving. Players step into the shoes of Sarah, a young woman struggling with a creative block that hinders her artistic expression

name: Why Do Boys Play Games?
summary: A 2D turn-based tactical strategy game where you create a character, join a fantasy football league, draft a team, and compete for the league championship. Make friends with your league-mates and defeat those same friends in battle to earn upgrades for your team as you also solve a greater mystery.

name: Whispers of the Hourglass
summary: After your mysterious death, you awaken as a ghost, drawn to the relics of a forgotten war between thieves and pirates. Shift between timelines and uncover the truth behind the war and death.

name: Whotfire
summary: This is a simple but yet complex turn-based shedding card game to which players are shared with some number of cards at the start of the game and a card is dropped at the center. This is based on some of the Whot Card game rules but much similar to a 2d fighting game.

name: Who's at the Door?
summary: You are trapped in a small house with psychosis, having lost your memory. Carefully observe your surroundings, distinguish between reality and hallucinations, and take the medication provided by visitors on time to overcome your illness.

name: Whispers in the Fog
summary: Whispers in the fog is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore a mysterious forest with haunted locations that will give you a terrifying experience. With realistic atmosphere, scary encounters and only a flashlight to light your way, unravel the mystery that is beyond the forest.

name: Wholesaler Simulator
summary: Build your own wholesale business in Wholesaler Simulator! Negotiate with producers, stock products in your warehouse, and fulfill online orders. Upgrade your warehouse, hire workers, and buy new vehicles. Manage deliveries and grow your business in this realistic trading simulation!

name: Whispering Stacks
summary: A Cozy Wizardly Rogue-Lite Zap-em-Up

name: Whispering Fog
summary: Whispering Fog is a first person psychological horror game set in an ever-changing forest shrouded in fog. A quiet getaway becomes a sinister nightmare as the illusion of safety and solitude slowly crumbles around you.

name: Whatnever
summary: An interactive comic about depression, creativity, a Deer mask and eyes-guys.

name: What a Shitty Job
summary: "Last P Class" is a 2D top-down survival action game with simple, easy and refreshing gameplay, containing a small amount of Roguelite elements.

name: What Happens After Midnight?
summary: An action-survival horror FPS where you are sent to investigate the small town of Nightvale and quickly find out an interdimensional force is invading our world. Hop between worlds, meet strange characters and survive cosmic horrors once you find out… What Happens After Midnight?

name: Whisker Wanderlust
summary: Embark on a leisurely journey through a kitten's eyes, where the world blossoms into a realm of magical whimsy. Whisker Wanderlust is here! Help the mischievous kitten (who just shredded their human's 376th yarn ball) collect treasures from distant lands

name: Where is My Ship?!
summary: Escape the kitchen after being tossed into the trash and find your ship to escape in this first person precision platformer inspired by Jump King, Only Up and Getting over it.

name: Whalefall Haven
summary: Whalefall Haven is a narrative-driven space opera RPG set in the Omnicport Junction, where civilizations converge. Choose your unique build and use Mimic to explore the mysteries. Build relationships and make decisions impacting your reputation and your fate.

name: Whimsy Bake ＆ Craft
summary: Whimsy Bake ＆ Craft is a relaxing and therapeutic idle game where you can craft adorable desserts while freely designing your home’s aesthetics. Embark on this sweet dual-healing journey to enjoy the perfect blend of creativity and cozy charm!

name: Whooshy Dragon
summary: Play as Whooshy, an adorable little dragon. Avoid enemies, defy gravity, and go further and further to get the highest scores. With its vivid graphics, intuitive gameplay and dynamic soundtrack, Whooshy Dragon offers an adventure that's accessible to young and old alike.

name: Whispered Secrets: Purrfect Horror - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you stop a forgotten god before it's too late?

name: Whispers of the Village
summary: You arrive in a small village as a fortune-teller who reads the future in tea leaves. But an apocalyptic vision leads you to question its tranquillity. What if you had a part to play in this? Ready your cups and tea leaves, as the future of this village will be shaped by four unusual visitors.

name: Whistle Pig
summary: In this narrative action adventure, experience both the beauty and the brutality of the natural world through the eyes of a mother groundhog on a quest for revenge.

name: Why I Don't Have a Country Any More
summary:
A procedural/interactive art game about living through a moral panic.

It's brick out...with added noise from the unbelievable number of anti-trans newspaper articles published in the UK in just one year and just one paper (The Telegraph), and some pretty obnoxious TERFs bouncing off the walls.

name: Whiskerwood Vale
summary: Whiskerwood Vale is an open world expressive platformer starring a fox knight who wields a magic greatsword! Using this sword, you'll soar through the skies and explore the floating islands of the Shattered Lands, battling evil foes, collecting acorns, and rescuing villagers along the way!

name: Wherein She Completely Cuts Herself From Reality: A Parabolic Emotion from recovery into despair
summary:
An anthology of three small "poetic" games and three small poems designed with the Formalist notion of "enstrangement" or "defamiliarization" in mind.

"Prescription" explores alienation in day-to-day life, routines, and the taking of prescription medication. "Find the Main Character" explores alienation toward the people around you and comments on solipsism. "Dressup" explores alienation towards one's self and the disconnect between internal world and outward expression.

name: What The Hack!
summary: What The Hack! Is a humoristic, story puzzle game, where you, a computer program, tries to avoid getting destroyed by escaping a facility. Doing so by hacking and hijacking devices in your surroundings.

name: Whispered Secrets: Cursed Wealth - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you find the truth hidden behind the castle walls?

name: White Night
summary:
White Night is a total conversion mod for Amnesia: The Dark Descent; and focuses on mostly storytelling.

This is an old-school type thriller. Although it's not mainly a horror game, it'll have its scares; and will offer beautifully designed levels in an old-fashioned asylum with various puzzles to solve. You will discover what happened to David, what he did, and why the mod is called "White Night". But, how are you going to be sure what's been told you, or what you see is the truth?

name: What do You Call a Group of Skeletons?
summary: What do you call a group of skeletons is a short comedy adventure where you will experience peak narrative, absolute gameplay, and hats! ...There will also be plenty of organ theft...

name: Whisperborn: Child of the Forest
summary: Whipserborn is a dark 2D roguelike set in a living forest shaped by sorrow. Explore procedurally generated levels, craft powerful spell combos, upgrade a mysterious hub, and uncover your forgotten soul’s truth—alone or in seamless co-op.

name: Whispers from the Star
summary: An interactive story about connection in isolation… where your words are the lifeline of a stranded companion in space. In Whispers from the Star, there are no dialogue trees, just open-ended conversations powered by AI chat, as you stay connected across light years.

name: Where the Chips Fall
summary: Balatro Meets Blackjack with a Cuphead aesthetic in this casino rogue-lite where you gamble with you abilities. Every chip you bet can turn the tide in your favor, but you could also lose it all in a bad hand. Think you can beat the house?

name: What Comes After
summary: What remains when everything falls apart? What Comes After is an episodic VR narrative experience set in the ruins of a forgotten settlement, abandoned by the world, but not by those who still call it home.

name: Who Trained the Hero?: Spin of Fate
summary: "Who Trained the Hero? -Spin of Fate-" is a slot-powered roguelike where you customize your reels, team up with allies, and forge the hero destined to save the world!

name: Wheel of Fortune: Pogo Edition
summary: Jump into America's favorite game show and live the excitement with each spin of the iconic wheel. Travel and compete to become a puzzle master today in Wheel of Fortune: Pogo Edition.

name: WhiteJill
summary: WhiteJill is a 3D reimagining of Blackjack with a strategic twist.

name: Whack Your Computer
summary:
Are you angry with your computer?

You don't need to feel frustrated ever again, simply tap on different items in the office and find all 15 ways to whack the computer.

This classic game had 12 ways and we've added 3 new ways so now both characters in the scene can whack the computer.

name: Whispers of Mexico: La Noche de la Casada
summary: Whispers of Mexico is a psychological narrative horror game with puzzle elements set in post-revolutionary Mexico in 1930. Follow Manuel as he navigates his mind, where he must recover his memory, unravel the mystery surrounding the town, and redeem his sins.

name: Whip/Sky/Fly
summary: Use your whip to fly through the sky and defeat your enemies

name: What Happened Here?
summary: What Happened Here is a short adventure horror game: around 30-45 minutes, exploring the classic horror trope of being locked inside a house and exploring it in order to go out.

name: Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
summary: Soar into new avian vistas with "Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 1"! Discover 16 new puzzles, explore diverse habitats, and unlock fascinating facts in your birdwatcher's journal. A captivating journey awaits!

name: Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
summary: Soar into new avian vistas with "Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 2"! Discover 16 new puzzles, explore diverse habitats, and unlock fascinating facts in your birdwatcher's journal. A captivating journey awaits!

name: Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
summary: Soar into new avian vistas with "Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 3"! Discover 16 new puzzles, explore diverse habitats, and unlock fascinating facts in your birdwatcher's journal. A captivating journey awaits!

name: Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 4
summary: Soar into new avian vistas with "Whispers of Wings Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 4"! Discover 16 new puzzles, explore diverse habitats, and unlock fascinating facts in your birdwatcher's journal. A captivating journey awaits!

name: Who's Beast
summary:
Step into a medieval village where betrayal hides behind every smile…

This online multiplayer game pits up to 12 players against each other in a battle of trust, strategy, and survival. Among the noble knights, impostors lurk—able to shapeshift into terrifying creatures like the Banshee, Basilisk, or Werewolf to hunt their prey under the cover of darkness.

Each match unfolds in real time, driven by a dynamic day/night cycle. Work together to complete quests, gather clues, and find scattered weapons—but be careful who you trust. Not everyone has noble intentions.

name: Whispers of the Void
summary: Whispers of the Void is a VR, first-person, story-rich sci-fi adventure set in a futuristic, mysterious galaxy. Designed to maximize immersion, the game blends exploration, puzzle-solving, and intense combat with swordplay and physics-based interactions — all woven into a deeply narrative experience.

name: WhiteFlame
summary: "Life will always continue, until you give up, because of your own weakness."

name: Where is Billy?
summary: Where is Billy? is a hide-and-seek party game for 2-8 players playable locally and online. Figure out which character you are and blend into the crowd to complete various objectives across multiple game modes. Act natural, avoid detection, and outsmart your opponents!

name: Where is the Culprit?
summary: Find the hidden character in the illustration! A timed picture puzzle game that sharpens your eyes and challenges your brain

name: White Rats
summary:
White Rats is a sci-fi survival visual novel set within the cold, decaying corridors of the research station UF-44.
When a group of survivors wakes up with fragmented memories and no clear way out, they must uncover the truth behind the station’s secrets — and the experiments that took place there.

Choices matter: each decision can lead to survival... or something far worse.
Investigate, adapt, and try to keep your mind intact as reality begins to twist.

Will you solve the mystery — or become just another test subject?

name: Whimsical Artefacts
summary: A co-op friendslop game with a heavy focus on customization via drawing. Scavenge liminal bunkers and obtain artefacts that may or may not aid you and your friends.

name: Wheelchair Wizards
summary: Wheelchair Wizards is a 4 player party game where you battle your friends while upgrading your wizard.

name: Wheelborne
summary: Do you have what it takes to tame the road and become the ultimate Wheelborne legend?

name: Whispered Secrets: Enfant Terrible - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you escape the nightmares before it's too late?

name: Where Is My Pocket?
summary: A voxel-powered comedy about clothes, pockets, and the people who need them.

name: White Noise!
summary: What?! Mr. Boring is trying to invade the universe? No way! Grab your shotgun, power gauntlets, rocket launcher, and the 24/7 rock ‘n’ roll bass cannon! Unleash a storm of bullets to the beat of the sickest rhythm and save the world the only way a true superhero can, White Noise!

name: What not coffee
summary: Create the café of your dreams in What Not Coffee, where every cup is a unique experiment! Craft bizarre brews like Circuit Board Latte and Sewage Tea, serve whimsical customers, and let your imagination run wild in cozy, quirky café locations.

name: When Eyes Close
summary: What if your sleep paralysis demon is more inventive than you think? Embrace the sleeper's nightmare. Explore rooms in a random order and find the answers: who are you, what happened to you, and most importantly, in which bed did you fall asleep?

name: Where The Flock!?
summary: Save a herd of lost sheep from a treacherous mountain using a variety of helpful (but sometimes risky!) tools in this quirky 2D puzzle-platformer adventure. Devise unique strategies to solve dozens of levels across multiple chapters, and get the flock back to the farm, safe and sound.

name: What Should I Eat
summary: Not sure what to eat? Download this game and it will decide for you. Now you never have to spend another second trying to figure out what you'll eat today. And this is not a "healthy diet" game, so you also get pizza and hamburger.

name: Whispered Secrets: Song of Sorrow - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you stop the malevolent Siren in time?

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? DVD Game: Family Picture Edition
summary: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? DVD Game: Family Picture Edition is an interactive DVD game based on the Australian version of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? featuring original footage from the host Eddie McGuire.

name: Whisper of Y'Ryando
summary: Whisper of Y'Ryando is a Lovecraftian puzzle-solving game that showcases a layered papercraft aesthetic. In this game, players will uncover the ongoing stories of the town through a unique perspective, acquiring hundreds of clue fragments by rolling dice.

name: WhamPunch
summary: First-person superpowered high-speed combat.Exaggerated physics destruction—destroy everything from streetlights to skyscrapers.Explore diverse stages, complete challenges, and defeat enemies.

name: What You Take With You
summary:
The story of a mech pilot who has to clear out his cockpit one last time.

Elements of find the hidden object and interactive fiction. Relatively short game you can play in your browser.

name: Whispers of Kelsden
summary: Solve five carefully crafted detective cases as Andrew Bell, a private investigator haunted by loss. In the fictional city of Kelsden, every decision matters in this linear, puzzle driven mystery game where time is important.

name: Whispered Secrets: In the Cards - Collector's Edition
summary: What does your future hold? The answers are in the cards…

name: Whispered Secrets: Morbid Obsession - Collector's Edition
summary: A mysterious invitation promises rare treasures but exposes dark secrets!

name: Whispered Secrets: Forgotten Sins - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you save your friends from the sins of their past?

name: Why Does the Sea Cry So Much
summary: The story follows Rosa, a young teen spending time in her family's beach house. One night, she sees a mysterious lady in the sea. After approaching her to see if she was alright, she discovers the lady is a spirit that comes back to this beach from time to time. The spirit offers to tell her an old tale, and Rosa will discover this tale is more connected to her than she imagined.

name: What's for Dinner?
summary: A surreal psychological horror game where you cook, serve, and slowly descend into madness. Solve puzzles, interact with strange customers, and try to stay sane as your world unravels.

name: When the Road Darkens
summary: A cooperative action game where up to 4 players battle through themed arenas, dodge deadly attacks, upgrade unique abilities, and survive raid-style encounters in fast paced combat.

name: What Is The Ghost
summary: Ghosts haunt the living, and only your company can identify them. Search haunted apartments, collect suspicious artifacts, and reveal cursed objects. But beware: the longer you stay, the stronger the ghost’s presence grows - and the deadlier your investigation becomes.

name: Where Time Ends
summary: Because of the loss of your mother and your desire of seeing her one last time you decide to build your own time machine in your garage. But beware, time does not forgive. There are 5 different endings and it has ps1 style visuals.

name: White Forest
summary: An unnatural forest has even more unnatural secrets hiding within it. Discover what lies beneath the surface while you investigate trails of blood and carnage which will lead you to untold horrors in this atmospheric First-Person Shooter.

name: Who Am I?
summary: Who am I is an immersive hidden object adventure of an epic scale. Take the role of an undercover agent investigating strange sci-fi incidents in the city as the threat of a weapon of mass destruction looms. Solve puzzles and seek out clues in over 70 detailed scenes. Find out who you really are to save the world!

name: When Stars Collide
summary: In this sci-fi romance visual novel, join the crew of The Ophelia after awakening from a 500 year slumber. Forge new bonds, find romance, and unlock a secret that could change the galaxy's future.

name: Why the Long Gun?
summary: Why change guns when you can attach them to each other? A shooting game where you're either forced to use all your weapons all at once, or you must launch them at enemies.

name: Whisper Village
summary: A story full of extreme tension and fear that a man who came just to shoot a documentary went through. Let's see if you can see the end of the story

name: Why Did You Leave Me Like This?
summary: A cursed house, five toys, and a restless soul trapped in a lifeless android. Can you find her toys before Natalie finds you?

name: Where's My Drink...?
summary: The Krusty Krab gets a phone call from a customer ordering pizza, the first one to request such a thing in ages. SpongeBob and Squidward leave to deliver the pizza to the customer's house, but the delivery takes a very unexpected turn.

name: Whitematter
summary: Shift your direction of gravity to the walls and the ceiling to overcome your obstacles in this first-person puzzler. Solve 40+ traversal puzzles that challenge your spatial reasoning skills. Take care, however, for not all is as it seems.

name: Where the Sky Is
summary: "Let's create in a mysterious world!"

name: Where's my Futa Deck?
summary: Someone scattered your precious Futanari deck all over the house! Search every corner, from under the bed to behind furniture, and recover your lost cards. Explore 3D environments, unlock spicy artwork, and complete your collection in this naughty hide-and-seek game!

name: Where's That Clown?!
summary: Where's that Clown is a frantic top down arcade game where you must keep impatient kids entertained throughout chaotic birthday party venues. Dash around, dodging toddlers and parents as you try to get the highest score!

name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego?
Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego?
Whale Left: Part 1
summary: To become Alice's friend!

name: What Makes a Hero
summary: Giona, province of Caspena - the land of adventure and opportunity! Champions of all kinds gather here. Step into this pixel-art heroic fantasy store simulator as the Shopkeeper. Listen to your clients and equip them with the arms that suit them best. Only you can prevent what is yet to come...

name: Whispers in the Bitter Frost
summary: A Cold Horror RPG about fragmented memories.

name: White Bridge
summary: White Bridge is a blend of role playing game and classic JRPG. It offers an immersive world for the players to explore and interact with. Choose the way you will deal with people and change the outcome of how they treat you.

name: White Ash Nightfall
summary: White Ash Nightfall is a 2D pixel-art side-scrolling horror adventure. As Tyler, a man who lost his memory, you must survive until dawn in Forest River, uncover dark secrets, and face monstrous threats.

name: Whiskers on Time's Corner
summary: In a beautiful small town, you are a lively and adorable cat, experiencing a rich and colorful life, exploring and enjoying the joys only cats understand, while helping your friends find a happy ending together.

name: When The Rumors Become Real
summary: Matt, a 14-year-old student, is forced to visit a ghost house for having "hide and seek with oneself" challenge . He invites his friend Esther to visit together and pretends to do the challenge. However something wrong happened during the challenge.

name: Where's my Hentai Deck?
summary: Someone scattered your precious hentai deck all over the house! Search every corner, from under the bed to behind furniture, and recover your lost cards. Explore 3D environments, unlock spicy artwork, and complete your collection in this naughty hide-and-seek game!

name: Where Is It: The Quest for the 10th Island
WhiteWash
summary: Relaxing and Healing Hand-Drawn Puzzle Game

name: Who's Hungry?
summary:
After a robot invasion that wiped out most humans from existence, a
human calls to DELIVERYCIOUS, one of the few food delivering services left.
You, a Delibot from the same company, must venture to another planet to deliver your
food. Explore a kilometric building where all kinds of bots will try to steal your food!

name: What Time is it?
summary: In What time is it?, you are shown a single image. Your task is to deduce the exact time shown and set the clock accordingly

name: What Was
summary: 3d space style game where you walk around a ship trying to figure out what happened as you seem to be the only survivor. In the far future as humanity fights its biggest war yet. you wake up in a broken ship floating in space with no clue what happened to the crew or the ship.

name: Who Summoned It?
summary: Unravel the Knotgud disaster in this point and click deduction mystery. Explore the town of Knotgud, interrogate townsfolk, and use magical items. Use your discoveries to piece events together in your scroll of truth and find out, Who Summoned It?

name: Where the Forest Ends
summary: Where the forest end is a story-driven, top-down horror shooter set in a zombie-infested post-apocalypse. Visceral, grounded, and realistic. A fresh take on a classic genre.

name: Whispers Among the Poppies
summary: A hand-drawn narrative journey through the eyes of a child who lives through war and possesses the gift of communicating with the spirit world

name: White Whisper
summary: An unknown signal. A silent ship. Only traces of the crew and empty corridors remain on the Sentinel. As Elara Wynn, you investigate what happened—and why the last transmission was a desperate distress call from the depths of space...

name: Why Me?
summary: Why Me is a 2D platformer full of unexpected twists and brutal tricks. Every level is designed to trick, challenge, and surprise you. Can you escape the chaos and master the impossible?

name: Whiskers Wizards & Wands
summary:
Whiskers Wizards and Wands is a whimsical and cozy adventure game. Take on the role of a Wizard Cat who interacts with the world around them via a customizable wand. Fight enemies, find secret treasures, design spell combinations, to repair a world that has been broken and scrambled.

The game has a beautiful orchestral score, and is completely hand-drawn. Every image was drawn with markers on paper before being placed into the game.

name: Where Are You?
summary: Where Are You? is a story-driven 2D adventure about curiosity, loss, and the search for truth — and about the question of whether values can survive when truth is forgotten.

name: WhoIs
summary: A 4-8 player PvP game of deception and paranoia. You have a role, a target, and one mission: eliminate them and escape. Use powerful abilities at the risk of revealing your identity. In this ever-changing arena, hunt or be hunted.

name: White Noise: Ghost Signal
summary: You are the new caretaker of a polar station. The assignment came unexpectedly, but you accepted it without hesitation. A lonely outpost in the middle of an endless frozen wasteland — a place where you must simply survive, follow the instructions… and keep your mind from breaking.

name: What Was Home
summary: What Was Home is a story-driven first-person psychological horror game rooted in urban exploration. Wander through decayed halls and forgotten rooms, uncover fragments of the past, and piece together the hidden stories of those who once lived here — including the secrets your parents tried to keep from you.

name: Where Is Mommy
summary: A retro horror game about spotting anomalies in looping environments and surviving the cycle.

name: Who Do Voodoo
summary: A social deduction game where crafted cards become spells. Protect allies, sabotage rivals, or prank everyone in a magical fight for survival.

name: What is Older?
summary: What is Older? is a fun, brain-teasing game where you choose which historical event, invention, or milestone happened first. From fire to smartphones, test your sense of time and chase the ultimate high score!

name: Why's It Getting Darker?!
summary: Descend into the abyss in this first-person deep-sea horror. Photograph hostile creatures, balance oxygen, and survive unpredictable ambushes—all while guided by a darkly sarcastic AI.

name: Where the Roots grow
summary: When a young woman moves out to the countryside to start anew on a farm, what she finds is not what she expected!

name: What the Stars Forgot
summary: What The Stars Forgot is a retro-styled sci-fi horror management sim. As an advanced starship's cutting-edge AI, you have to guide a procedurally generated crew of hundreds as they embark on a dangerous mission to discover the source of an anomalous signal emanating from deep space.

name: What Kokkuri-san says will come true
Why Me
summary: 3D 3rd Person Perma-Death Climbing/Running/Swimming Game with progressive difficulty. Some Traps are unfairly tedious. Set a Record Time or Record Death Count. The Question is "Can you beat the game ?"

name: Whacked!
summary: The big boss is looking for a new right-hand henchman, so it’s your time to shine! Choose a gangster, put on your most stylish suit, and WHACK your friends in this fast-paced, action-packed, top-down PvP shooter! Dive and shoot your way through destructible maps while trying to not get WHACKED!

name: When It Falls
summary: An apocalyptic Ice Age approaches the automatic doors of your convenience store. Scrape together what you need to survive through bartering or outright scamming in this short narrative game. In the end, only you can judge yourself.

name: Where the Heart Rests
summary: A sweetly domestic boys' love visual novel about a couple of young men who find themselves raising a child.

name: Whispers of Elenrod
summary: Deck-building meets strategy map exploration. Craft powerful decks. Discover mysterious artifacts on procedurally generated maps. Defeat enemies in turn-based combat and gain experience to evolve your hero. Create your best build…and find all the Whispers of Elenrod!

name: Whimpact!
summary: Creature collection and co-op arena challenges come together in Whimpact! Collect, care for, and adventure alongside your Whims, who grant you incredible powers. Then dive into the fast-paced, cooperative arena to find and reclaim the world’s missing Starcane energy.

name: Where’s the Food!?
summary: Have fun with your family♪ Find the hidden FOOD!

name: Where’s the Insect?
summary: Where’s That Insect Hiding? A Cute and Easy Brain-Training Picture Hunt Game

name: Where’s the Octopus!?
summary: Find it and smile! A family-friendly octopus hunt!

name: What's the Password?
summary: "What's the Password?" is a minimalistic puzzle game where you decode 4-digit passwords. Featuring over 100 puzzles!

name: Which hand?
summary: Solve the titan’s riddle, uncovering more hidden rules and connections each time you try

name: When the Wildflowers Leave
summary: When the Wildflowers Leave is an engaging narrative RPG. Stop through an anthology of meteor-stricken towns while carefully convincing each of them to harbor a radical. Commit to decisions shifting you and your companions’ mental dilemmas, and make the choice for or against uncomfortable change.

name: When Sirens Fall Silent
summary: When Sirens Fall Silent is a dark psychological thriller set in 1990s Italy. Play as Mila, a troubled policewoman drawn into a high-profile case of kidnappings and murders. As the case unravels you must not only save her from herself, but from being swallowed by a vortex of violence and confusion.

name: When Sirens Fall Silent
summary: When Sirens Fall Silent is a dark psychological thriller set in 1990s Italy. Play as Mila, a troubled policewoman drawn into a high-profile case of kidnappings and murders. As the case unravels you must not only save her from herself, but from being swallowed by a vortex of violence and confusion.

name: Whiskey Mafia: Blacklist
summary: Step into the gritty streets of Chicago in Whiskey Mafia: Blacklist, a story-driven crime adventure. Play as a determined detective navigating a city full of gangsters, corrupt cops, and hidden dangers. Investigate crimes, follow leads, interrogate witnesses, and uncover the secrets of a mysterious Russian crime syndicate. Explore diverse locations from bustling markets and shady bars to the dangerous docks. Experience immersive dialogues, thrilling chases, and tense confrontations in a detailed, atmospheric city. Can you survive the criminal underworld and bring justice to the streets of Chicago?

name: Whispers Beyond
summary:
Whispers Beyond is a semi-cooperative deduction game set in a dark fantasy world where a restless Spirit guides a circle of Inquisitors to solve a murder. Uncover the suspect, location, and object of fate by interpreting the Spirit’s visions and whispers; surreal visual and audio clues that reveal fragments of the truth.

Work together… but only those who read the signs best will truly see beyond the veil.

Choose your role:
- The Spirit: Communicate without words. Send abstract visions, offer whispers as audio clues, or bestow extra signs to guide the living.

- The Inquisitor: Interpret the Spirit’s clues to uncover the truth. Use your perceptions to evaluate and wager on others’ choices for an advantage.

Features:
- Online multiplayer for up to 8 players
- Solo play with AI companions
- Adjustable difficulty, customize: inspirations, perceptions, hand size, timers, and more

name: Where Winds Meet: The Imperial Palace
When the Embers Wake
summary: When the Embers Wake is a third person narrative adventure with a cause to create awareness about the very current and real threats on wildlife. You play as a red panda that needs to survive amidst environmental challenges, threats and also grief.

name: Whatta Frogs?
summary: Persuade your friends by lying or telling the truth in this social deduction game, all in the pursuit of scoring as many points as possible! Does your box have a fruit? Yes or no, it doesn’t matter—just convince them to pick you!

name: Whoowasit?
summary: Reveal the secrets of the speaking animals and find the thief!

name: Where Winds Meet: Timeless Bonds
summary:
Version 1.1 of Where Winds Meet, also known as "Timeless Bonds."

This update includes a new map (Roaring Sands), campaign (River Master), world boss (Feng Ruzhi), sect (Velvet Shade), gameplay (Gossip Paper), and challenge (Taiping Mausoleum), along with other events, optimizations, and fixes.

name: Why Am I Here
summary: An immersive side-scrolling survival game combineing colony simulation with action survival. Gather resources, explore hazardous lands, manage and care for your companions' needs. Upgrade and defend your home using your own strategies.

name: Where Are We Floating?
summary: A 1–4 player co-op adventure where you sail across a wild sea in search of a legendary treasure.

name: What the Luck?
summary: "What the Luck?: CoOp Defense" (also known as Lucky Defense!) is a mobile tower defense game heavily centered on RNG (random number generation) and luck-based mechanics. Developed by 111percent, the game challenges players to defend against waves of monsters using summoned units, with success determined by whether they "beat the odds".

name: White Memories
summary: Take the mantle of a postman who refuses to give up his job, even after death. Clinging to your last memory, take off into the world of the forgotten to deliver your letters to the ghosts that are stuck there, allowing them to reach the afterlife. Protect your mail from those who are pursuing you.

name: Whisker Wanderlust: The Mosaic of Souls
summary: Welcome to "Stray of Lost Cat", a story centered around a peculiar little feline. Follow the kitten's journey as it escapes the pursuit of "Meowdes" while collecting soul fragments, striving to reunite with its beloved owner.

name: When The Snow is Gone
summary:
In an unnamed town made of concrete walls and floors, you take a housekeeping job. You are hired by an owner you have never met. When you arrive, you find the apartment locked from the outside…
but a voice from within says, “It’s unlocked.”

name: What’s in the Box?
summary: A first-person incremental game where you buy and open containers filled with random items, repair and upgrade the things you find, and sell them for profit. In a dark industrial environment, upgrade your character, tools, and machines, earn money, and step by step work your way toward freedom.

name: Who the Hell Opened the Portal?!
summary: A funny pixel art roguelite strategy. You manage a fantasy island kingdom connected by magical portals. By day — build, gather resources, hire heroes, and dive through portals to expand into new lands. By night — defend! The same portals unleash hordes of demons straight from Hell.

name: Where We Went
summary: Where We Went is a narrative driven puzzle game. Step into the role of a mysterious character that can control ancient guardians to solve puzzles. Uncover the story behind your visit to the tomb and the reason for it's existence!

name: Where Winds Meet: Live to Game
summary:
Version 1.2 of Where Winds Meet, also known as "Live to Game."

This update includes new maps (Nine Mortal Ways Base & Mistveil Prison), an encounter (Bellman's Oath), lost chapters (The Gilded Chase & Whispers Beneath the Moon), sect (Velvet Shade), and a gameplay (Boss Dummy), along with other events, optimizations, and fixes.

name: Whimsy Koi
summary: Whimsy Koi is a cozy idle game where you manage calming koi ponds. Collect various whimsical koi fish and decorate your pond however you want. Just relax and enjoy the tranquil experience.

name: Wheel Saint: Hellride
summary: Wheel Saint: Hellride is a rogue-like race through purgatory to rescue lost souls! Drive your car through neverending waves of demons, find lost souls and upgrade your ride!

name: Whispers Between Worlds
summary: Born with the ability to see spirits, Yui is banished to the Spirit Realm for reasons yet unknown. On his journey back to the realm of the living, will Yui be able to temper his resolve, and confront his shaken past?

name: Whodunnit: The Midnight Murder Mystery Files
summary: Puzzle out the who, what, where, and why of an imminent murder in this casual mystery title!

name: Whisk
summary: Whisk is a two-player platformer about shared movement and communication. You’ll coordinate leaps and grabs as Luna and Foam, to send all Dreamcats home!

name: Whiskers Warehouse
summary: Push, solve, and unlock your way through 2,000 brain-teasing levels in this addictive puzzle adventure!

name: Whisker Cowboy
summary: Whisker Cowboy is a top-down arena shooter. Load your revolver with superpowers, predict enemy movement, aim carefully, shoot ghosts, and survive wave after wave.

name: Where We Used to Play
summary: A first-person psychological horror game focused on observation, anomaly detection, and meaningful choices that lead to multiple endings inside a house filled with forgotten memories.

name: Where’s the Tuna!?
summary: Find it and smile! A family-friendly tuna hunt!

name: What We Carry
summary: What We Carry is a dark, gothic strategy RPG where you can only see yourself. Walk a brave path through an unseen world, face random event cards, and survive the weight of every choice you make—if you can carry it.

name: Whiskers' Wish
summary: Discover the life of an abandoned kitten in this cute and heartwarming adventure. Explore the city park with other strays, solve puzzles, make friends, and face dangers—all while dreaming of finding a forever home.

name: Whistle! Dai 37-kai Tokyo-to Chuugakkou Sougou Taiiku Soccer Taikai
summary: Konami published Game Boy Advance game based on shonen sports man Whistle!, developed by Intense.

name: Whispers of Winter Blossom
summary: Beyond the falling snow awaits the miracle of meeting you.

name: Whendle
summary:
A daily 'guess the year' puzzle game where players have to find the single year in which 5 events took place. The events are presented one at a time, obscure ones to start with, but becoming more well known, allowing the player to use knowledge or deduction to guess a year after each one. The game gives feedback on how close each guess was.

After the quiz the player can share their final score and a 'Wordle-style' results grid to challenge their friends. Whendle also keeps full statistics on their performance.

name: WheelMates
summary: Grab a friend and dive into a co-op adventure as a pair of RC cars. Drive through the house of an eccentric professor, team up to solve puzzles, explore hidden paths, and uncover what happened inside the house.

name: Whodunnit
summary:
WHODUNNIT is a comedic mystery visual novel following a man who must answer a burning question: who the hell did he hook up with last night?

Conduct investigations through point-and-click mechanics, interrogate a large cast of characters, and cobble together theories as "regular guy" Howie Falk chases down the ghost of his own gay virginity.

name: Where's My Egg?
summary: Where’s my egg? A poor chicken dad has sadly lost his eggs. Help him find 62 strange eggs and bring them back.
